message: Thank you all for your invaluable guidance on the Pod submission. I really appreciate the time you took to analyse the problem in detail, and I‚Äôm looking forward to seeing the results. It‚Äôs fantastic that this work has the potential to reduce what would have been two months of effort. Thanks again for jumping in and giving your time ‚Äî it‚Äôs truly appreciated.

Team,  Thank you all for your participation in the December NPS workshops based on the "buyer" (B2B) survey results.  As we have called out multiple times,  we have raised the bar again this wave,  with NPS of +48 (remembering the scale goes from +100 to -100 !)   Over the course of two days you participated in listening, brainstorming and putting yourselves in our customers shoes.  Thank you to all who showed up - many of you attending multiple sessions - with energy, enthusiasm and passion for improving experiences.  We are only at the start of our NPS rollout for this wave,  with still some teams to go and I can already tell from our kick offs that the commitment is there across everyone in Workhuman to deliver for our customers in 2026 and beyond.  Well done on some amazing sessions!

The Upper Funnel Product campaign has rounded out the year to be the most significant brand advertising initiative of 2025, and this is the group to thank for bringing it to the world. Our approach was innovation-forward, capitalizing on the dazzling Human Intelligence 2025 Release. A big thank you to our creative partners‚ÄîJames, Liu, and Matt! Creative achieved documented breakthrough on YouTube, exceeding 20% relative Awareness lift at statistical significance. Annie and Ethan, you drove the strategy, planning, and in-market distribution of the message across 22 media partners including social, video, print, and a wave of podcasts. Effective brand advertising supports all stages of the customer journey. Cheers to this group!

Carrie, Eva, & Liu, thank you all so much for the hard work you put into creating new templates for our webinar program! You've already made some impactful shifts in the templates for 2025, but I can't wait to use the new and improved ones as we head into 2026! I appreciate the detail, strategic thinking, and creativity that went into building these out, and for looping our team in along the way. The templates are truly beautiful, and will pop so nicely once they're out in market! Thank you for the continued collaboration with our team, and for helping us make our programs the best they can be!

Matt and Eva, so grateful for getting to work so closely with both of you this year! Matt, not only I learned the term "wet cement" from you, you've been a true writing/conceptual force behind the Davos paid media assets ‚Äì on top of all the great work you do for a little event called WHL. Eva, your partnership with copy strategy in alignment with optimizations for paid, organic social and email design optimization strategy has been phenomenal ‚Äì your approach is equal parts thoughtful and strategic and no doubt it contributes to the effectiveness and performance of the work. Last but not least, thank you both for being just plain kind humans and a joy to work with. Here's to more and even better in '26.

Reflecting on the year as it ends - this is to highlight the resilience and teamwork you showed in 2025. Yes, there were many, many successful events. And, underlying that work was a lot of change and growth. You had to adapt to new team structures, reassignment of event leads, learning new processes, and continuing to develop the best experiences for our attendees and co-workers. As usual you did it without fanfare; quietly applying your expertise where it was needed most, thinking of the smallest details that often go unnoticed but have major impact. These things make the Experiential team better than none - cheers to you!

This is an overdue shout-out to the incredible subject matter experts driving the ongoing, cross-functional work to elevate our blog.  Liu, thank you for helping us unpack all the maintenance needs, improvements, and opportunities across this part of our website. You made a complex series of ideas flow into steps toward an MPV state.  Jesse, your competitive insights and vision for differentiation have been energizing. Amanda, your accessibility expertise and ability to balance user experience with our content goals strengthen our work from the ground up. You‚Äôve both scoped, prioritized, and planned for long-term improvements, helping build something lasting rather than just launching.  Anna, Erika, and Lucas, your writing and editorial instincts continue to sharpen our narratives. You make our content more persuasive, more on-brand, and more grounded in real-world proof points. For a top-of-funnel audience, the stories we present may be their first introduction to the brand. Thanks to your attention, we‚Äôre striking the right balance between education, value, and actionable advice for every querying audience.  This team broke a broad goal into individual streams and moved forward with critical work to achieve our 2026 vision. With your help, the blogs we've updated this year have aligned with all our H2 initiatives, from hub and spoke content marketing to brand positioning and differentiation messaging, to AEO visibility, even as the strategy evolves.   Thank you for driving the progress and impact of our blog. Your expertise, creativity, and dedication have moved us closer to our vision for a cohesive, high-impact, and sustainable platform. I deeply appreciate every contribution and look forward to what we‚Äôll accomplish together next.

I would really like to thank each one of you for your continued support and commitment. You are always there when needed, providing guidance and solutions that make a real difference. Always following up for me on payments/invoices/ receipts/journal entries. Really appreciate the time you have each given me this year. This has all helped me so have a smooth close every month. Looking forward to working with each one of you in the new year! Enjoy the holidays!

....That is a direct quote not from one person, but from multiple executives about your work on the End of Year All Hands celebration deck. You took an idea and brought it to life in a way that was both engaging and inspiring. Your thoughtful use of animation and intentional design elements helped tell a clear story about the most strategic and impactful moments across our business and culture this year. You incorporated feedback seamlessly and approached every iteration with a collaborative, supportive attitude. Thank you for bringing this to life so beautifully!

As 2026 nears to an end I need to acknowledge the enormous win we have realized for WH Media and Workhuman at large. When comparing our advertising capability and experience from the beginning of the year to the end, it couldn't be more different. Our store has been brought to life with native but visually interesting and engaging ads that objectively improve the experience. That experience all started with a good design and vision for where we're going and what would be commercially viable. With that vision in place this team got to work with the various integrations which often required on the fly creative solutioning and incredible patience with our ad server partner, Osmos. Creating the inventory and ad units also required us to solve quite a few unforeseen challenges given the unique white labeled nature of our catalog and experience.  On top of all this the team was held to extremely rigid deadlines where sold ads needed to launch on a specific date. This made releasing tedious and required extensive orchestration with legacy ad commitments. This series of work positions us so well to grow this business. I can't wait for us to tackle the next big thing in 2026. Well done everyone!
award_title: 2026 was a HUGE win for WH Media.

message: Kaleigh, This year has been an incredible experience working with you. message: As we close out 2025, I want to celebrate the incredible achievement of launching Social Sharing, one of ConnectCorp's key new features this year. Since its launch on 15th July, adoption has been outstanding‚Äî1,691 LinkedIn posts created by 1,048 users across 30 customers, and the numbers keep growing! üéâ This success was driven by exceptional collaboration: Emma and Jake, for aligning dependencies and ensuring a smooth product launch; Lisa, for enabling Social Sharing for clients on platform launch; and Rachel, whose stewardship and keen eye for detail rallied Product Leadership, ensured the customer success team were ready and enabled, and maintained quality standards for every post created. Your efforts made this feature a standout success in 2025. Looking ahead, I'm excited about the new Social Sharing capabilities we'll deliver in 2026‚Äîsharing Service Milestones and other celebration moments, enabling nominators to share awards they've given, and expanding beyond LinkedIn and internal platforms to additional platforms. The journey continues, and the best is yet to come! üôå

message: Hey all, I would like to take this moment to thank each of you for your support this year. From IT issues to TaskTracker to CoreSystem, I have had to reach out to each of you multiple times for help and I am very grateful for that. Thank you!

Phoenix & Titans, This award is a small attempt to recognize something that has been anything but small this year. We shipped. We delivered real outcomes for the business. We solved hard problems‚Äîsometimes under tough timelines and occasionally with requirements that evolved mid-sentence. But this award is not just about the work but how we worked. Over the year, you exhibited what true partnership looks like‚Äîproduct, engineering, QA all pulling in the same direction. You challenged ideas, debated strongly and aligned quickly. The trust we have for each other translates directly into impact for the business, and it showed in every release we shipped. But even more, what makes this team special, goes beyond delivery velocities and roadmaps. You bring kindness into our day-to-day interactions. You create space for different opinions, backgrounds, and working styles. You help each other learn. You help make work a place people enjoy coming to. We can laugh after a tough sprint, celebrate small wins, support each other on hard days ‚Äì that's the culture we have built. Thank you for the partnership, the friendship, the patience, the humour, and the trust. The year behind us was stronger because of you‚Äîand I am excited to get the ground running with you all next year. Wishing you and your loved ones a very happy holidays.

Thank you to the cross-functional teams for the successful transition of the final physical gift card, Starbucks, in Singapore to a digital gift card. This means the Singapore market is now 100% digital, representing a significant achievement for one of the five largest markets in APAC. The goal was to move this market to 100% digital by the end of the year and we did it so a huge well done all! This is another big step forward in our broader digitalisation journey and a clear example of effective cross-functional collaboration delivering tangible results. Moving fully to digital gift cards brings substantial benefits across the business - enhancing the customer experience through a more seamless and intuitive journey, reducing operational complexity and lead times, and unlocking meaningful cost efficiencies! Beyond the immediate benefits, this transition also strengthens our scalability, improves speed to market and positions us to better support future growth. A great accomplishment for the teams involved and a strong foundation to build on as we continue to drive digital transformation across the region.

Team - I want to recognise the fantastic team effort to finalize our Employee Transfer policy! This has been a challenging topic for some time, with multiple approaches explored over the past couple of years. While the policy we've been solving for may not affect our entire employee base, finding a practical solution was crucial for supporting our internal mobility goals, enabling employee career growth and enhancing retention. The new approach reflects extensive research, thoughtful consideration from legal, compensation, systems and employee experience perspectives and careful drafting and design. Rachel - thank you for leading this initiative with me and helping bring it to the right place as an addition to our Internal Mobility policy. Jennifer, Emma and Claire - your expertise and inputs were invaluable in shaping the decisions. Michael, Lisa, Amanda, Robert - your contributions across the many touchpoints were essential to getting this over the line. Many thanks to everyone for your creative efforts, collaboration and partnership. While communication and implementation of the new policy are still to come (first offer under new policy in progress), I want to acknowledge this important milestone and the positive outcome it represents on our journey to be better every day. Well done all. With much gratitude!

These moments are some of our most visible and impactful company-wide engagements, and you all truly leveled them up. From the planning to the execution, every detail reflected your passion for creating meaningful experiences for our humans. Thank you for showing up with excellence time after time, for supporting each other, and for making these meetings something we can all be proud of.  Your work shines‚Äîand so do you. ‚ú® Thank you for an amazing year it's going to be hard to top in 2026!

message: Thank you all so much for jumping in and making sure today's TechCorp Leaders Meeting was productive, engaging, and informative. My sense is that people really appreciated the expertise and transparency on display. And making time for shout outs at the end was beautiful touch.  I'm grateful for all the flexibility, teamwork, and thoughtfulness that went into making this such a high quality meeting. And thanks for having my back while I recover and wait for my voice to return to the land of the living.

Maya and Sam,  As we finish up 2025, I just want to say a big thank you for all your help and teamwork this year! Your hard work and willingness to step in whenever I needed support really made a difference. We've achieved a lot together, and I truly appreciate everything you've done. It's been great working with you, and I'm looking forward to continuing this in 2026!

Delivering an AI initiative takes more than planning‚Äîit takes alignment, trust, and incredible teamwork behind the scenes. This "AI Bootcamp pilot" showed what can happen when teams come together with one purpose and move decisively toward a shared vision.  A big thank you to our L&D representative 'Lisa' for driving the coordination behind this AI Bootcamp pilot‚Äîyour focus and teamwork made this milestone possible.   Thank you to our executive sponsor 'David' for your leadership and for approving this initiative to move forward; your support enabled us to take a bold step into our AI journey.   And thank you to our workplace team member 'Sarah' for the flawless room setup, seating, food, and logistics that brought the experience to life.   Grateful for the collective effort behind such a significant initiative. This is only the beginning.
award_title: AI Bootcamp- behind the scene team!!

message: Thank you to each of you for being a part of our filming yesterday around the office. We know the asks were short notice, with many of you being approached on the spot, and you certainly weren't prepared, but each of you performed as if you were worthy of an Oscar award! Your support means a great deal to us and it truly helps move this initiative forward. We appreciate your time, enthusiasm, and your willingness to help us bring this project to life. Thank you again!

Your teamwork, hustle, and positive energy made a massive difference. I'm still in awe of that record-setting turnaround‚Äî16 minutes for set up on Tuesday afternoon in the Summit Cafe! That doesn't happen without every single hand, every bit of effort, and a whole lot of heart.  I'm genuinely proud to partner with humans who get it‚Äîpeople who are willing to roll up their sleeves, step in where needed, and make the magic happen. Your willingness to help doesn't just support the event‚Äîit fuels our culture.  Thank you for showing up, jumping in, and making it look effortless. You are appreciated more than you know! üôå‚ú®

Maya and Sam, I just want to call out the fantastic collaboration between the Benefits team and the Payroll team. From LOA to Pensions processing, there was nothing that slipped through the cracks from your team to ours. It is an absolute pleasure to work with both of you. Your professionalism and attention to detail has ensured that we managed our benefits through Payroll correctly for all employees. I look forward to our continued collaboration in 2026.

I want to take a moment to recognize the incredible partnership between Workplace Experience and FP&A throughout 2025. From reviewing countless spreadsheets to navigating through numerous meetings, your collaboration and commitment made all the difference. We did great work together, and it truly showed in the results we achieved. Thank you for your hard work, flexibility, and teamwork. I'm excited about what we'll accomplish together in 2026!

Claire and Jessica, I wanted to take a moment to thank you both for your incredible partnership throughout the year. Claire, it's been an absolute pleasure working with you on so many projects, especially the October merit cycle. I really appreciate the time and guidance you gave me as I navigated this process for the first time, it made a huge difference. Jessica, we only started working more closely in H2 this year, and I'm pretty sure there were weeks when you considered blocking me because of the sheer volume of questions I sent your way (sorry about that!). Thank you for your patience and support, I truly appreciate it.  Looking forward to continuing our partnership in 2026!

Team, huge congrats on delivering such an incredible family festive event, with a very special visit from the big man himself üéÖ the level of planning, logistics, and hours that go into making something like this happen for over 100 kids - especially in an already busy work week. It takes a huge amount of coordination, and creativity.  You pulled it off as I knew you all would. The atmosphere, the smiles, and of course the grotto - was all amazing. I know how much effort sat behind the scenes, and you should be incredibly proud of what you delivered.  Great job and very well done. Thank you for going above and beyond, as always.

I would like to extend a big thank you to this HX team for all your support, partnership and collaboration this past year. Working with you all in 2025 has been such a rewarding experience, and I really appreciate everything you've done to help us succeed. I'm looking forward to keeping the momentum going between HX and FP&A and continuing our partnership in 2026. Here's to another great year together! Thanks again for everything!
Appreciate you adjusting the time to make it possible for the kids to see Santa in the office. The kids absolutely loved the visit and all the fun activities

Hi Jordan and Casey,  I want to take a moment, on behalf of the Customer Service Leadership team, to express our gratitude as we wrap up this year.   Thank you for leading by example and always being there when we needed you. Whether it was a big challenge or a small issue, your advice and guidance were always available when we needed them most.  Managing such a complex team across multiple shifts, each with its own unique challenges, is no easy task. Yet, you both make it look effortless thanks to your experience, approach, and dedication.   Customer Service is truly fortunate to have you on board, consistently finding ways to navigate and mitigate situations of varying complexity.  We deeply appreciate your support and leadership, and we look forward to collaborating even more in the year ahead!

As we wrap up the year, I want to take a moment to recognise everyone. The way we show up for each other and for the wider business with professionalism, respect, and a genuine willingness to help, it really stands out. Thank you all for the effort, care, and collaboration that often happens quietly behind the scenes. Wishing everyone a very happy Christmas, and here's to continuing to support one another and build on that respect together as we head into 2026.

Marcus thank you so much for your support and walkthrough sessions for DataView VAT Reports for Europe. The reports were more complex than we expected but thanks to your effort and patience we now have new VAT data that we can rely on.

Oliver, Sarah, and James, I want to take a moment to thank you for the way you showed up to our half-day 2026 planning session. Your engagement, energy, and willingness to lean into the discussion really stood out. We used the time to walk through our strategic direction and have open, practical conversations about how we can deliver next year. The way you worked through priorities, projects, and ownership helped turn the session into something meaningful and set us up with real clarity on what comes next. I genuinely appreciate the focus, collaboration, and positive attitude you brought to the day. Your contributions made the session stronger and laid a solid foundation for the work ahead. Well done, and thank you for the effort you put in.

Just wanted to say thanks to you all for being the best colleagues anyone could hope for. It was a challenging year with a lot of substantial changes but working with you through everything is always a pleasure and I look forward to achieving even more together in the year to come!

Emma, thank you for your continued support this year on different projects - Regional Compliance Report, Eastern Europe Control List, EU Trade Statistics. You have not only ensured progress but also inspired confidence across the different teams with your proactive approach. I hope you get to enjoy a nice Christmas.

Daniel!! There are many many reasons why I'm so grateful to work with you. I was only singing your praises with someone last week. Apart from being a talented designer (you are) and incredibly knowledgeable about our product (which you are), you are most importantly a really really nice guy. I've always been so impressed by your determination to not only learn and develop new skills, but to also help others do the same. You're a really amazing team player and you set a high bar in terms of design but also being a HUMAN in the workplace. More and more these days I appreciate that. I'm so grateful to be your manager and your friend. Have a great Christmas Daniel - you are one of the good guys and deserve a wonderful xmas break and a brilliant 2026!

Guys just wanted to take the time to thank you all for working together over the last 12 months. Digital marketplace has a lot to it and Its not always straight forward but the urgency to get issues closed is amazing. Not to mention welcoming me on Friday mornings to your huddle. Thanks again for all the help, I look forward to continue working together in 2026!

I just wanted to say thank you for all the great work on accessibility for Customer Portal last sprint. We achieved a lot together, and I really appreciate all the help, input, and expertise from everyone.

Adrian, I just wanted to say how grateful I am to work with you. You've been with us for over three years, but honestly, it feels like ten. Your calm presence, even in the most stressful moments, is something I appreciate more than you know. You're a UI guru with the most soothing voice in the business, and a fountain of knowledge when it comes to branding‚Ä¶ and beer crafting. We've shared so many great "Big Project" moments, loads of laughs, and plenty of indie music love... plus all those unforgettable client-branding conversations. And truly, thank you for always lending me a hand with those last-minute requests or when I needed someone to stress-test designs. You've never hesitated to help, and it's made such a difference. Thanks for being such an amazing teammate and an even better person to work with. Here's to many more good chats and good days ahead. Merry Christmas Adrian, I hope you have a Proper Crimbo!!!!!! Bring on the celebrations!!!!!!

As we wrap up the year (and after these last few hectic weeks getting the reward cards stocked for the season!), I just want to thank you all for making this team such a great place to belong ü´∂ The way everyone steps in to help each other, keeps our customers at the heart of every decision, and brings positive energy every day truly makes a difference. I'm grateful for the support, the collaboration, and the laughs we've shared this year. Wishing you all a wonderful and well-deserved Christmas break! üéÑüéÖüèª
award_title: Before We Dive Into the Mince Pies‚Ä¶

message: I would like to extend my sincere thanks to you all for the tremendous work and collaboration throughout the year. Handling thousands of physical and online orders ‚Äî from booking to shipping ‚Äî requires precision, coordination, and constant teamwork. Your dedication, flexibility, and commitment have been key to ensuring smooth operations and timely deliveries, even during peak periods and high volumes. I truly appreciate the close collaboration, problem-solving, and shared effort between our teams. Working together has allowed us to overcome challenges, support each other, and consistently deliver results. Thank you for your hard work, reliability, and team spirit. I look forward to continuing our collaboration and building on this momentum in the year ahead.

As we close another year, I would like to sincerely thank you for the strong collaboration and partnership we have shared. Working toward the same goals, we have achieved meaningful progress through open communication, shared knowledge, and a true spirit of teamwork. The projects we delivered together, the insights exchanged, and the many constructive discussions and meetings throughout the year have all contributed to better outcomes and stronger alignment across our teams. Here's for another successful year ahead.

It's not an easy thing to come together as a new team. Particularly when you have many different goals and responsibilities. I'd like to recognize all of you for coming together as a wonderful new team in 2025, and for welcoming me as your nominal leader. It's been really incredible to watch you all help and support on another and learn to work together so effectively. Thank you also for your patience and support as we have tried to re-organize and rethink roles to be more impactful for the business. It's been a big lift and I am so grateful to you all! Here's to a terrific 2026!
nominator_title: Senior Director, Thought Leadership and Brand Narrative

message: Hi Priya, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for your vigilance and quick thinking last Friday night. Your ability to identify the system-wide error and follow protocol so efficiently really helped minimize the impact of the issue. It's such a relief to know that when I'm off, the team is in such capable hands. Your professionalism and expertise are invaluable, and I truly appreciate everything you do to keep things running smoothly. Thanks again for your dedication and for always being someone I can count on!
Happy birthday from TechFlow Solutions, have a great day!

Team, I couldn't have asked for a better group to accompany me on the journey of launching and demonstrating TechCorp's Analytics Premium Platform. We gained so much knowledge and ultimately delivered an outstanding demo to TechCorp's Global HR leaders after weeks of hard work. Thank you for your dedication, support, and even humor throughout this process, which has brought us to where we are today. Michael and Lisa, your technical expertise ensured everything was configured perfectly. Rachel and Amanda, your diligence transformed a Recognition Summit into a comprehensive Analytics demo with clear communications. David, your hours spent with us and TechCorp were invaluable in understanding the scope of turning on Premium and preparing the product for demo. Alex, your last-minute pitch-hitting was crucial for such an important demo. This is an incredible display of teamwork and dedication. Now, we can all take a moment to appreciate the hard work--well done!

This team continues to drive white glove service to TechCorp as they evolve how their leaders interact with their program! You held prep sessions and accomodated TechCorp's global leadership at 10pm to demo Analytics Premium Platform! As out first client to be actively engaged with trialing our premium product your commitment to its success is on full display! Appreciate the commitment and cross funtional collaboaration to drive this initiative!

message: Jordan, I wanted to take a minute to recognize your perseverance in leading the charge on AudioTech's approval rules updates and executing their recent all-company award. You were thrown various complications along the way but stayed the course, ultimately delivering a positive result for the client. The same goes for AudioTech's need to better understand the long-term impacts of Global Integration, where we were able to successfully collaborate with Robert. Robert ‚Äî thank you again for your diligence and preparation in helping AudioTech navigate the details of their global integration conversions. As Executive Sponsor, you stepped in and made a real impact on a very challenging and complicated situation. Thank you both for your partnership ‚Äî onward and upward for all things AudioTech!

Team, I want to express my gratitude for your incredible support in creating and delivering ChipTech's 60 Day Review. Kelly and Brian, your meticulous attention to production details ensured we had enough time to refine and drill down the data. Chris, your swift adaptation to the ChipTech account and your exemplary problem-solving skills truly stood out. Nicole, your strategic insights into the semiconductor industry and best practices were invaluable. Jessica and Mark, your dedication went above and beyond to ensure a seamless transition. We've overcome so much in the past 60 days, and it's wonderful to take a deep breath and look forward to the next chapter. Your teamwork exemplifies the best of collaboration, and I feel fortunate to have you all as partners. Here's to ChipTech 2026!

Taylor & Sophie, I want to spotlight you for two reasons: (1) The excellent recognition program review you recently provided to AutoSoft, where you illustrated for the how they are already reaching our best practice adoption metrics in year 1, and (2) the well-deserved recognition you received from the AutoSoft HR and Procurement teams at the end of the call. As captured in the screenshot in this recognition moment, AutoSoft have given us a "performing above expectations" rating - which they noted is a rare rating for them to give a vendor. They also spoke very highly of each of you and the partnership you've provided in this all-important first year. A quote from their PM, Jake Thompson: "A year ago we knew we desperately needed to change our recognition vendor, and we know we made the right choice in PeopleFirst. Our experience with you is far and away better than with our previous vendors. Taylor & Sophie come to every call with great data and - importantly - ideas for us on how to act on it." Taylor and Sophie, thank you for your dedication to AutoSoft and helping them build a strong culture of recognition!

Marcus, congratulations on successfully rolling out Smart Analytics to all of your customers! You were instrumental in not only managing everyone's unique set of timelines and customizations, but you truly sold the value and the benefit of all these amazing features. Appreciate all you did to keep Phoenix Corp and Sterling Industries on track and holding them to the desired timeline. Fantastic work getting everyone live! Cheers to this milestone!

Sarah, Michael, Marcus - fantastic work on your 2025 customer award winners! Sarah, Meridian Corp has been a huge success story for us - everyone wants to learn about the gratitude challenge! You've done a great job keeping the team engaged and maximizing every feature of our platform. They embraced Smart Analytics from day one and fully leaned into the power of Next Gen to support their HRBPs. Michael, your top-to-bottom relationships at Pinnacle Group are truly paying off. Not only do they have a strong R&R program, but they've expanded into CEO team awards, launched custom programs, and clearly see the broader possibilities under the TalentFlow umbrella. Marcus, Nexus Systems faced a major challenge merging two distinct employee populations, and their Excellence program became the perfect bridge. They not only brought a new population live, but they took the opportunity to revisit their existing program structure and modernized everything from award levels to eligibility to approvals to be best in class. Well done, team!

Team, I wanted to send a shout out to the post-launch Apex Healthcare team as we cross the 90 day mark! Rachel, you have been a driving force on keeping the team organized, keeping Apex Healthcare informed, and building a strong relationship with Jennifer & Robert as we support them post launch. Robert, you're continuing to build strong relationships with Amanda and the rest of the Apex Healthcare team. Your expertise with Enterprise Feedback has also been huge while working through recent discussions. Plus, you are on the ball for forecasting! Connor, you've been instrumental in providing the additional and very specific data points that Apex Healthcare has requested, in addition to managing recent changes to their service year configurations (considering they have an award level for each individual service year), and supporting all the other troubleshooting & configuration changes that have come up. Daniel, it is still early on but the Apex Healthcare team and us appreciate your insight and efforts to help drive further engagement in their platform. It's a pleasure working with you all and I hope you take this moment to celebrate all the good that has come from supporting Apex Healthcare thus far!

Team, as we cross the 90 day mark with TechGlobal, I wanted to give a huge shout out to this team for the collaboration, considerations, and all of the hard work the team has put into these past 3 months in supporting TechGlobal post-launch. Jake, you were brought onto the team later than some others but with how quickly you jumped right in, no one would ever know. You've been a driving force in keeping up with all of the requests that have come our way and always have an update ready. Emma, you've been a rock to the team. Your level of responsiveness, attention to detail, being the captain of the ship with their bulk uploads and addition of programs requests, and diving into the data for the reviews are just a few of the many things you have done these past months. Lauren, I am giving you the title of the "Thoughtful Organizer", you've been critical in keeping everyone on task while we balance multiple requests at once, asking the hard-hitting questions, and bringing the mindset of what would benefit TechGlobal most. Sophie, your background and expertise has been instrumental in steering this choppy course. Thank you all for the support, collaboration, and getting us in the right direction with TechGlobal these past 3 months!

Alex, you've been phenomenal in our two recent major contract extensions. You consistently bring sharp market insight, best practices, and a big-picture perspective. You pull the right people into the process and always aim to do what's best‚Äînot just for me as a customer, but for TalentFlow as a whole. You've got incredible skills, and I've learned so much from working with you. Plus, you're an absolute pleasure to deal with. üòä Thank you for everything. And hey‚Ä¶ I'm still holding out hope you'll manage to sneak in a few free Summit Conference passes in our Enterprise Platform renewal‚Äîthat would be the ultimate masterpiece! Lisa

I wanted to take a moment to thank you all for your recent help with fixing Vertex Solutions' file transfer system. Vertex Solutions is a newly launched client, and it is important that we're able to quickly provide support if & when problems arise. Grace, I appreciate your organizational skills and ability to send over the data load logs in a timely manner. This helped greatly with troubleshooting and pinpointing a root cause. Ethan, thank you for keeping an eye out for new files that the client was sending over, ensuring that they processed successfully, and providing extensive reasoning if they didn't. You were able to communicate all technical errors in a clear and simplified manner that was easy for me to understand. Your clear explanations helped me clearly explain the situation to the client. Lastly Oliver, you're always there to step up and help all of our clients. In this situation, you helped provide updates not only to Grace & Ethan, but also to the Vertex Solutions team. Despite the very short notice, you hopped on the troubleshooting call with Vertex Solutions to help explain the situation and the resolution. To all of you, I appreciate your thoroughness in communication and respect for urgency. As a result, we fixed the file transfer system and displayed excellent customer service skills & support for a newly launched client!

Team - I had the pleasure of presenting at today's TS Monthly All-hands about what a successful TSS/SCD/CSM/Consultant partnership we have for GlobalBev Corp! This group maintains excellent communication which enables us to provide top-notch customer support for one of our largest clients. Engaged weekly client meetings, weekly internal touchbase meetings, the GlobalBev Corp messaging channel, and other tools all ensure we're all on the same page for their many moving pieces. We present a united front, quickly get answers we need, and provide the best client care. Victoria - you've stayed on top of their lengthy weekly items list, tracking down answers left and right. Patricia - you successfully negotiated a 3(!) year renewal and have helped escalate issues internally - keeping track of their ever-growing wishlist has given us a happier client! Isabella - you've been a master of best practices, guiding them through their rebrand, and thinking ahead to getting more frontline users involved. In TS, I've felt supported and heard when bringing up concerns. Thank you all for a great partnership this year!

I feel incredibly lucky and grateful to have had the privilege of working so closely with you three over the past few months. I've been truly impressed by the care you bring to our customers and the level of professionalism and expertise you show on every call. The Fusion Designs journey has been full of twists and turns‚Äîpeaks and valleys‚Äîand you've handled it all like absolute pros. I've really enjoyed getting to know each of you and partnering together along the way. Let's get this across the finish line and celebrate with some well-deserved holiday cheer!

Hi Cameron, Thank you so much for your quick adoption of the changes in your pipeline for both the Analytics V3 model and the person-level aggregation model. You implemented the updates rapidly and demonstrated a strong understanding of the requirements from our side. Your hard work, dedication, and commitment were clear throughout the process. Really appreciate your speed, flexibility, and support
award_title: Thanks for Strong Collaboration on Analytics V3, PLAM

message: This teams relationship with Pinnacle Financial has driven the request for TalentFlow to present at the December Fuel Up Friday event! This event affords anyone at Pinnacle Financial to attend and this month Maya and Jessica presented the Science of Gratitude and the Value of robust messages along with encouraging recognition within Recognition Hub and Stars of Excellence. Patricia your continued reinforcement of how Recognition Hub adds value for Pinnacle Financial continues to create executive engagement with their Vice President of Culture and Talent kicking off the session. This demonstrates the power of you being strategic, delivering insights and cultivating connection! Appreciate the energy you all demonstrate to find new and impactful ways to engage not just leaders but entire workforces!
award_title: Fuel Up Fridays at Pinnacle Financial
recipient_title: Senior Communications Manager - Global and Strategic Accounts

message: ‚ÄãA quick note from home to wish you all a Merry Christmas and a wonderful New Year! ‚ÄãThank you so much for your incredible support and for absolutely everything you do. I especially appreciate you managing the workload while I'm out enjoying paternity leave! Looking forward to catch up with you upon my return! Merry Christmas!!

As we approach the end of the year and take stock, I want to express my heartfelt thanks to each of you for your collaboration and support throughout the year. Working alongside such a talented, dedicated, and genuinely great group of people means a lot to me. Your efforts, professionalism, and willingness to help never go unnoticed. I truly appreciate everything you do and the positive impact you make every day. Here's to finishing the year strong and looking forward to what we'll achieve together in the year ahead!

Hi Jordan, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for handling the new Marketplace supplier cases. Your support has truly made a difference, and I really appreciate the effort you put in. Thanks again for your dedication!

Happy Birthday Blake! I hope you have the best day ever, filled with lots of fun, family time and last but not least, that yummy peanut butter cup cake! Tell Maria to share this recipe!! Enjoy your special day

Ryan, on behalf of the entire Night Shift Team, we want to extend a genuine and heartfelt thank you for everything you've done throughout the year. Your support has gone far beyond the expected, and your willingness to step in, solve problems, and look after both our people and our customers has made a real difference. This is one of those rare occasions where every award reason truly applies. Your innovation, your respect for the team, your commitment to customers, your focus on quality, and your sense of urgency have all shone through time and time again. You've been a steady, positive force for us ‚Äî dependable, thoughtful, and always ready to help when it matters most. Thank you for the exceptional effort, the late-night support, and the countless ways you've helped the team succeed. We appreciate you more than you know. ‚Äî The Night Shift Team

On behalf of the customer service leadership and management team, I would like to take a moment to express our sincere appreciation for the outstanding collaboration and teamwork demonstrated throughout this year. It has been truly inspiring to see how we have supported one another, worked together, and achieved our shared goals. Your commitment, dedication, and collaborative spirit have made a meaningful difference. The success we've achieved is a direct result of your trust, communication, and unwavering teamwork. We look forward to accomplishing even more together in the year ahead.

message: Hi Ryan, I wanted to take a moment to thank you for the individual training session. I greatly appreciated the personalized attention and the way you tailored the exercises to align with my specific goals. Your guidance made the session both challenging and motivating, and I feel that I gained valuable knowledge from it. Thank you again for your time and expertise. I truly appreciate your support in helping me understand the Marketplace supplier concepts.

Sam, I want to say a huge thank you for assisting me with investigating the issue that arose regarding a customer seemingly receiving access codes to the Commerce portal due to an issue with our CRM system. By putting our heads together, we were able to identify the issue, gather the relevant information and screenshots and put it all together in a ticket for, hopefully, a quick resolution for both the supplier to gain access back to the portal and customer to stop receiving a flurry of emails. Thanks again, Sam! Your dedication and willingness to always go above and beyond for the team does not go unnoticed!!!
award_title: Sherlock and Watson to the rescue!!!

message: Folks, this award is way overdue for all the help and support we got from you guys during the year. From system calculation checks, updating reports, uploading our parameters with new quantities and testing our inventory model changes you have always been a great support. Your system knowledge ensures our logic is checked before we make any changes!! The min/max model will be a more efficient process and I'm confident we will get this completed in Q1 2026. Looking forward to more improvements and challenges in 2026!!

Thank you everyone for an efficient and smooth sprint. The collaboration was outstanding, and the great communication helped us complete all tasks on time. Well done to everyone involved for contributing in the best possible way. üëèüëè

Thank you for managing the call on one of the times this customer called while she was really angry for something that was not our fault; and for raising the alarm that something was not ok. We then managed to put a team together and help the customer.
award_title: Thank you for your help with this challenging case

message: I want to take a moment to recognize the incredible work our focus group has accomplished since March in reimagining what was previously known as the 'department leads meeting.' What started as a traditional cross-department ceremony has evolved into something far more valuable‚Äîa space where department leaders truly connect, collaborate, and drive meaningful outcomes together. This transformation didn't happen by accident. It required commitment from each of you to plan thoughtfully, challenge conventions, and be willing to experiment. You pushed us beyond death by powerpoint, testing new formats and approaches that prioritized engagement and results over routine. The attendee feedback speaks for itself‚Äîwe found the right formula by being bold enough to try different things and humble enough to learn from what resonated. Most importantly, you made it enjoyable. We proved that effective leadership meetings don't have to be a chore‚Äîthey can be energizing, productive, and yes, even fun. As we head into 2026, we've built a strong foundation that will only continue to improve. Thank you for your dedication, creativity, and willingness to make this meeting something worth attending rather than just attending. Here's to building on this momentum in the year ahead.
award_title: Death by PowerPoint? Not on Our Watch

message: Marcus, as we close out the year, I want to recognize your exceptional leadership since joining our team mid-year. Stepping into this role under challenging circumstances required not only technical excellence but also tremendous adaptability and courage. You have risen to this challenge with a combination of optimism, resilience, and a steady presence that has become invaluable to our team. In an environment characterized by rapid pace and constant change, you have brought a sense of calm and focus that enables us all to perform at our best. Your dedication to shielding the team from unnecessary disruptions is remarkable and crucial to allowing us to concentrate on delivering the outcomes our business requires. From my vantage point, I see much of what you manage to protect the team from, but I've no doubt there's even more happening that you shield me from. What truly sets you apart are your people skills and genuine investment in supporting everyone around you. Your can-do attitude isn't just about positivity, it's backed by action, problem-solving, and an unwavering belief in what this team can accomplish together. Personally, during the last 6 months, your support and steadying influence have been instrumental in my ability to continue contributing effectively. Thank you for being a friend on difficult days. I'm grateful to work alongside you.

Innovation Steering Committee, Setting up the Innovation Group for the very first time was no less than a challenge‚Äîbut each of you rose to it with passion, creativity, and true teamwork. You inspired one another, and together we built something truly remarkable. This year, we built a solid framework, a clear scoring model, and successfully completed our first evaluation cycle. We celebrated an amazing award ceremony, recognized brilliant ideas, and saw happy inventors smiling with pride. Honestly‚Äîwhat more could we ask for? Thank you once again. It has been a great initiative to lead and an even greater experience to be part of. As I step out to take on a new mission‚Äîone that I hope will lift from Earth and go all the way to Mars‚ÄîI carry with me deep appreciation for everything we built together. Wishing you all a Merry Christmas and a wonderful New Year ahead. I look forward to seeing all that you will continue to achieve. Thank you innovation steering committee‚Äî keep inspiring.

Sarah, thank you for your constant support, guidance, and leadership throughout the year. Your thoughtful direction and encouragement have made a meaningful difference in how we approach challenge throughout the year. Working with you has been both inspiring and motivating, and I'm excited for what's ahead as we continue shaping the future of our platform together.
award_title: Grateful for Your Leadership and Support

message: Thank you both for prioritizing and implementing the fix for Service Years scheduled job. We noticed a few months back that it was getting cutoff every day when it clashed with the release processes and additionally running into the following day for the second run. Service Years is a very important part of our system, that needs to run twice every day to guarantee delivery of emails and awards to literally thousands of people everyday. As you found out, some time back an unfortunate, seemingly small change, was made to seriously degrade the performance of the job, by an unrelated team. Viktor, you painstakingly identified the issue, zeroing in on where the time was been lost and implemented a fix delivering it to production on 10th Dec. We can now see Service Years has gone from taking ~7 hours on a typical day to ~3 hours on a typical day (heavy days can be multiple times). Marcus - this improvement would not have happened without your partnership and recognition of its importance to the normal running of the business, juggling other high pressure, high priority work items like 'media processing' and award loading for a new client launch. I know and recognize that was tricky to accomplish. Really appreciate both of your efforts on this and whoever else was involved, both in implementation and prioritization, that might have been invisible to me. Thanks to you all.

Team, As we approach the end of 2025, I want to take a moment to thank you all for driving the department to new heights this year. Across virtually every operational metric, we performed significantly better than last year, which itself was a transformative year. To me, this clearly reflects the ongoing commitment, dedication, collaboration, and leadership that each of you brings to the department. We had a hugely successful year, and every one of you, individually and collectively, played a pivotal role in that success. Of course, as leaders, we can never sit back or slow our efforts to keep improving. But we can and should take a moment to recognize and appreciate the great work we've done together. I wish you all a Merry Christmas. Enjoy the break and the time with your families and loved ones to relax and recharge.
award_title: Thank You, Team, for a Great 2025

message: Just a little before our closing time this Friday, we were flagged with a high-urgency issue that required immediate action. message: 2025 was a hard fought battle. We started with the Platform Surge, shipped Reward Stories, redesigned store width, built 5 new ad formats from scratch, reinvented Recommended Sort, all while managing our formidable tech tasks of External API, messaging migration, and security updates. In the final stretch of this year, you all have continued to bring best selves to work and keep up an incredible pace to cover accessibility requirements, search improvements, and media platform wrap up. You have contributed so much thought, collaboration, determination, and‚Äîyes‚Äîinnovation this whole year and we can see the impact it has made. - Conversion Rate is up by at least 1.5% with our UX improvements. - Margin per session saw a similar increase in just the first experiment on Shop My Balance! - Over 12 thousand Reward Stories have been shared! - Over $200k in ad revenue has been generated by the net new ad formats this team built Each of you is an incredible asset to this team, to our e-commerce experience, and to TechFlow Solutions. Thank you for your excellent questions, your brilliant ideas, your dedication to quality, insistence on scalability, and the truly remarkable work that you've done this entire year. I hope you each get a long, restful break before we pick up our superhero capes and do it again in 2026! ü¶∏üèªü¶∏üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü¶∏üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

The customer was delighted with the service they received and appreciated the fast resolution to their query.  Fantastic job, everyone! A big congratulations again to all of you, and thank you for everything you do for our customers. Keep up the amazing work!

The end of the year is one of my favourite times, mostly because it naturally invites us to look back at all the "wow," "ugh," and "did-that-really-happen?" moments of the past months. And when I look back on 2025, I feel nothing but pride, and a huge part of that comes from getting to work alongside this strong leadership team. Your care, kindness, and resilience shine so brightly that your teams reflected it in the meaningful moments they're able to create for our customers. Sure, not everything this year was a walk in the park. Maybe some of it felt more like a hike in the rain with strong mountain wind! However, whenever challenges pop up, we know we can rely on each others knowledge, and experience, which is what makes us stronger every single time. Now, 2026 is around the corner, ready to throw new adventures our way, and I can't think of a better team to face the surprises, chaos, and victories with than all of you. Thank you again for all your great work this year! ‚ú®

As we wrap up 2025, I want to take a moment to thank every single one of you for the fantastic work you've done this year. It's been a year of change, growth, and learning‚Äîand through it all, you've shown resilience, adaptability, and an outstanding commitment to putting our customers first. Thank you for supporting each other, for backing your teams, and for having my back too. Because of your hard work and collaboration throughout the year, we went into peak well-prepared‚Äîand absolutely smashed it ( so far at leastüòâ) ! I'm truly grateful for each and every one of you and the unique strengths you bring to this team. You've made a real difference, and it doesn't go unnoticed. Here's to an even more successful 2026‚Äîthe sky is the limit! Thanks again for everything. It is a pleasure and privilege working with you !

Marcus, I figured I turn my IRL recognition shoutout into an official one for employee recognition :). Not enough words to described the incredible positive impact you've had since starting your TechFlow tenure which, believe it or not, it's barely 7 months old. Big shifts happened the week you started ‚Äì the team you were leading got bigger and joined a new function, new priorities were still in flux... all that alone is a lot to take in. But on top of it, you also had the entire company onboarding process, so... water from a fire-hose x1000?! Through it all and since, you've been a leader who's supportive, empathetic, collaborative, decisive, thoughtful, inclusive, and ‚Äì probably more importantly ‚Äì a someone who sees and believes in their people and their potential for growth. Thank you for being you!

Congratulations to this group for supporting a real-life behavioral science experiment‚Äîquantifying the halo effect of paid media on website traffic and responses. As a business, we've known for years that core drivers of Demo Requests and Contact Us Sales responses come from direct load, organic search, and paid search sources. In 2025 we had the chance to observe for the first time ever what it would mean if one of those 3 sources shut off‚Äîthe advertising freeze! The correlation was clear: paid search went to 0 while organic search and direct load traffic to the employee engagement platform page and responses dropped over 60%. The trend line was compelling, but we needed to rule out other factors. Sarah, Alex, and Emma‚Äîyou supported the analysis understanding organic trends, proving that in fact core employee recognition terms were gaining organic ranking ground and search traffic fluctuation was negligible. David and Michael, you were at the helm of NA and EMEA paid search this year, pivoting by month and by quarter as budgets shifted and took on in-house management responsibility with the relaunch in December. As we go full-steam ahead in January, I look forward to watching the trend line reverse. This time we'll be able to better calculate total business ROI and make optimizations accordingly. This is a huge insight driving our marketing investment!
award_title: Quest for the halo effect of search marketing

message: Jordan, you have been steadfast in getting deep and solving a longstanding challenge for TechFlow, mobile employees and the spectrum of other cases. You approached the challenge head on, diving into who these users are, how they use our platform today (or not), what their challenges are, the competitive landscape, and most importantly the solution. We've spent countless hours together talking through the space and I know you have spent 10x that on your own. You have exemplified the thoughtfulness and quality we strive to have on our team not only in information collected but how you collected it. Less than 24 hours after talking through solution options, you had prototype coded a user interface mockup. The solutions we are getting to are going to be a game changer for our business. I'm thankful to have you on the team and for all the thoughtfulness you have put into developing our product strategy.
award_title: From Endless Debates to Thoughtful Progress

message: Kevin, wanted to say how impressed I am with the work you've been into the Product Social Committee, and especially in planning the upcoming volunteer day on Dec 17 with the Children's Hospital Foundation at Metro General. SO many things we are tackling to organise but you've handled it with so much grace and patience! I'm looking forward to this event so much, so much work has been put into it but the cause is so important! We're making such a difference to these people, so it'll be worth all the work! Great work and I'm very grateful to get to work with you on the social committee!

message: Lisa, Rachel, I want to take a moment to recognize the outstanding work you've both put in over the last few weeks to help us fully understand and meet the accessibility requirements tied to the contract we're in the process of agreeing with TechCorp. The walkthrough video you shared with stakeholders yesterday was also a fantastic and effective way to kick this work off across the relevant product teams. While there's still significant effort ahead, you've laid an excellent foundation. Thank you both, and the wider team, for tackling a long-standing accessibility challenge head-on and for helping ensure our product works for everyone.

Thanks to all of you for your help during the year, we have had many emails back and forth and many questions but in all our many issues during the year, you all remained professional, considerate and understanding of some of the difficult situations that we came across, I really appreciate your support, Fair Play.

message: I'd like to take a moment to thank the Phoenix team for your incredible effort and commitment throughout this sprint, and for the preparation you've already put into the next one. Every one of you has truly stepped up, especially while navigating changes, challenges, and the absence of our product manager. Your proactive attitude, preparedness, and the way you've supported each other have been absolutely remarkable. Today, we closed Sprint 5 having completed all committed work, followed by a high-energy demo. This momentum carried straight into a smooth and highly focused Sprint 6 planning session. Your preparation went above and beyond; defining the remaining work, reviewing the backlog across FE, BE, and Testing, and helping to clear and refine it so we enter Sprint 6 with complete clarity. You've turned what could have been a very tough time into a real success. Echoing Ryan's words at the Q4 All-Hands, you have truly made the impossible possible. It's clear we have a dream team here. I'm excited to close Q4 in Sprint 6 by completing the essential development for Media Integration (Beta). It's a significant milestone, and with the momentum you've built, I'm confident we'll continue making the impossible possible. Thank you so much for your hard work and dedication. Your contributions are profoundly appreciated.

Jessica, I want to thank you so much for leading the team in the development, presentation, and curation of content in the December Marketing All Hands. Your role is strategic, thoughtful, caring, and critical for effective execution! While often behind the scenes, you are a driving force of Marketing communications and a true cultural energizer!

Chris, As we wrap up the year, I want to acknowledge the significant impact you've had across the Customer space. Your leadership on engagement reward stories, your drive to open new revenue streams through margin optimization, ad revenue via our platform and continued store optimization, have all made a tangible difference to our results and momentum. Stepping into sole Product Director responsibility for all of Customer during the mid-year re-org was no small shift, yet you handled it with confidence and pace. You came up to speed on Services remarkably quickly, and your work shaping the 2026 roadmap was thoughtful, grounded, and set us up well for the year ahead. You're consistently a great partner to work with. Commercially sharp, constructive, and always focused on ensuring the highest-value work rises to the top. I truly appreciate the collaboration and the positive tone you bring to every interaction. It is really great to partner with you and I especially appreciate your growth mindset especially around evolving technology and that our planning sessions are inclusive of all the priorities from our many stakeholders. Thanks for a strong year, and I'm looking forward to what we achieve together next.
award_title: Thanks for your leadership and partnership in 2025

message: Kate, huge congrats on wrapping up the new feature rollout for all your accounts! I know that was a heavy lift, but you really nailed the enablement process for all of them. Thank you so much for owning this and for all the hard work!

Amanda, well done in getting Phoenix Corp to agree to move their subsidiary off the legacy system, with a target date in February! You did a lot of research and preparation for this initiative, working internally with E-Commerce and then having multiple conversations with the customer to get them comfortable to the idea. They had some initial hesitations, but have now agreed to make the change. Well done in pushing this important initiative forward!

I was not in the room last round H1, you and Grace rocked it over in the regional office, and I now saw why it was such a success. NPS was up, and the mood was high, but work was needed. There was a myriad of actions taken and documented. Though I won't go so far as to say these were specifically an outcome of the NPS workshop, it was clear to me from this week that there is a tether and an accountability that links the teams to a common and shared goal. I have loved these last 2 days seeing you work. This is your zone, this is your passion. The links from end user back up through program representation at client level and up to fulfilling the brief of the clients need. It was a pleasure Jennifer seeing you weave ties that go beyond the departments and forge alliances to overcome obstacles. You were in your element and it has lifted a group and created a team!

Team, thank you very much for the amazing work this year on supporting the NPS workshops with decks, in presence support, knowledge and research. This was an example of true teamwork and respect for our customers at all levels. Internal , external, repeat and new. I appreciate all of the work that went into the delivery. Next year we will be giving ourselves plenty more time and will challenge ourselves to bring even more new insights to the table. Great job!

We set out to move our cloud Windows stack from legacy security solution to modern endpoint protection before Feb 2026. Because of your work, the new environment is up, permissions and server policies are in place, installs are rolled out across dev, preprod, perf, and half of prod, performance testing is complete, and we're largely ready for the next cutover. Thanks for sharing your time and expertise.

I want to extend a big thank you to everyone for handling the high-pressure context switching last week. We needed to get our release out on this Date after circumstantial delays. Pushing the new privacy policy and validating it despite unexpected environment hurdles on Friday, was no small challenge. The learnings from this will be documented for others to benefit from. You listened to my concerns and adapted quickly for the benefit of our client commitment. Your professionalism and understanding were truly exemplary as this was not a regular or smooth release day. These things happen but the response was critical. thank you all.

I wanted to recognize the brilliant work done by this group to prepare for an execute a three-hour data modelling workshop between the Business Analytics Team, The Data Platform Team and Data Architecture. We'd planned this one for a couple of weeks and a lot of preparatory research had been done before we even opened up the video meeting. We worked through the topics methodically, sharing ideas and plans as the call progressed. As a result I think we're in a far better position to reduce duplication and waste across the whole data estate, saving time, effort and money for our customers and the company. Thank you all for your contribution to the workshop and to implementing the strategies and methods we discussed in the sessions.

Marcus - As the year comes to an end, I want to acknowledge the incredible impact you've had on me personally and on the entire department. You constantly push us to stretch beyond our boundaries and see the bigger picture, enabling the team to deliver outcomes in months that would typically take years. Your sense of humour, authenticity, and ability to anticipate what's coming next make you not only highly effective but genuinely inspiring to work with. Thank you for being you ‚Äî you are truly one of the best leaders I've had the privilege to work for.

This clarity ensures that marketing investments are directed toward the right accounts, strengthens alignment with event partners, and allows us to build strategies that meet prospects where they are in their journey. In addition, the ability to map competitor accounts, assess varying intent levels, and analyze stalled or lost profiles provides us with a sharper competitive edge. This work not only improves efficiency but also enables us to deliver more impactful programs, with messaging and engagement designed to resonate at the right time with the right audience. Your collaboration has elevated the quality of our output and set a new benchmark for excellence. I am genuinely excited to see how this foundation will enable us to execute with greater precision and creativity in the months ahead. Thank you once again for your dedication and contributions. This is a significant achievement, and I am proud of what we have accomplished together.

Every moment made an impact, and together we created an experience that moved TechCorp forward and strengthened our connection for the future.

Thank you all for the ways you've showed up for me, both personally and professionally. Congratulations on winning the Popular Choice Award to Smart Diagnostics, an innovation that our engineering community is excited about. This innovation started with a simple but powerful insight: our engineers were losing too much time hunting through logs, dashboards, ticket systems, and documentation just to understand what went wrong. This team set out to change that, and they delivered something remarkable. Smart Diagnostics is an AI-driven incident analyst that aims to automatically interprets error logs and stack traces, identifies ownership, pulls relevant context from across our ecosystem, and generates clear root-cause hypotheses, with actionable recommendations. Even better, it could slot directly into automated workflows, eliminating manual steps entirely. The impact is clear: root-cause analysis time dropped from 30 minutes to about 2 minutes. That's real efficiency, real scale, and real value. This is innovation with purpose‚Äîsolving a genuine pain point and elevating how we support our products and our customers. Congratulations to this team behind Smart Diagnostics, and thank you for delivering an outstanding contribution that clearly resonated across the engineering organisation. Looking forward to seeing how we can evolve this from a POC to solve even greater toil issues with improved recommendations

message: As we wrap the year, I want to recognize what we achieved together. We navigated change, aligned as one function, and focused on the work that would make the clearest impact. What we delivered was thoughtful, strategic, and steady. - We expanded our earned media presence through strong relationships and a targeted approach. We built trust with journalists and helped position TalentTech as a serious voice in HR tech. - We strengthened our analyst momentum through consistency and credibility. We brought our full story forward and left analysts energized about where we are heading. - We advanced our executive activation program with clear strategy and strong cross functional partnership, giving our leaders the tools to show up with confidence. - In product marketing, we sharpened our positioning, clarified our messaging, supported the field, and enabled our customer and prospect teams to understand our products with a new level of depth. - We elevated our research and thought leadership with grounded, data driven work that builds trust and sharpens our point of view. - We strengthened customer storytelling and made real customer voices central to how we show value. - And our customer communications program became a true revenue engine. We launched our community platform, improved how we engage customers, and influenced millions in awards issued. Across everything, we were intentional, disciplined, and collaborative. We proved what a focused, talented team can accomplish. Thank you for the work, the heart, the impact, and for showing up every day ready to make a difference. I am proud of what we built together, and so grateful to lead this org! 2026 will be a good one!

message: Patricia, your exceptional effort in revitalizing our Canadian RRSP benefit program is greatly appreciated. Your proactive and meticulous approach was key to its success after a two-year lull in participation. You ensured a seamless process and prevented potential transfer interruptions by directly coordinating with Northern Life Insurance Company to verify current payment details and meticulously cross-referencing this information with our internal payroll systems. Furthermore, you took initiative to drive significant process automation. By delivering employee and employer contributions via import directly to the insurance company, rather than through a representative, you streamlined the workflow, resulting in faster fund allocation for our human talent. Your diligence was instrumental in delivering an overall positive employee experience.

Patricia, I want to recognize your exceptional work on the recent payroll adjustments. Your hard work and meticulous attention to detail were instrumental in successfully processing 307 adjustments with a total value of $7,143,835.73.  This significant achievement involved managing 12 separate Excel data file extractions from our health benefits system, organizing them into pivot tables, and manually sanitizing the data to account for a year's worth of changes including new hires, terminations, and coverage updates. You then expertly entered these details into our payroll system and spreadsheets, ensuring accurate journal entries for our international team. Thank you for kicking off our year end season on a very positive note! You are truly amazing and I am grateful.

message: Team, what a year 2025 has been for North American Paid Media! In all the years since our team was created in 2020, this year has seen the most change and evolution. We started the year running a robust set of campaigns‚ÄîTechConnect Live Mountain Resort, the January Trends webinar, Upper Funnel Product, Business Intelligence release teaser messaging, Digital Event registration, 50 ABM 1x1 programs, 10 ABM cluster programs, and more. Shane and Anna‚Äîyou were there from the start and ensured that campaigns were launched on time and KPIs were tracked with clear performance vs goal assessment. We worked with two external agencies, collaborating across time zones‚Äîno easy feat. Then came the summer slowdown and ultimately advertising freeze. In spite of the degree of change, you rallied and reinvented your scope‚Äîlearning new skills, supporting organic efforts, and launching into 2026 planning. You have embraced and adapted to a new Performance Marketing team structure and CMO leadership. And then I decided to bring paid media buying in-house, hiring 4 new team members to support our campaigns! As if the worklife change was not enough, there were epic changes in your personal lives as well. Shane and Kerry welcomed baby Lily Rose! Anna and Matt got married‚Äîquietly buying land for a new house in Westborough! My prediction is that 2026 will be a year of growth, but whatever may come I am so grateful to have you by my side.

Thank you, Antonio, for taking the time to walk us through the Database Health tool and its capabilities. Your clear explanations and deep knowledge of how the tool monitors tablespace growth, resource utilization, and SQL performance were incredibly helpful. We appreciate the insight you provided into its dynamic reporting features, as well as your thoughtful responses to questions around broader database support and cloud platform authentication. Your presentation gave us a much better understanding of how the tool can be used to troubleshoot performance issues, and we're grateful for the effort you put into sharing it with us.

message: All, I wanted to take a moment to express gratitude for the spectacular work you've done over the past month to meet our client Stellar Energy's needs. Your efforts were the definition of cross-functional collaboration across the E-Commerce, Accounts, Engineering, Technology and Customer Success teams. Stellar Energy is a proudly regional company, and their CHRO informed us of their imperative to offer more local redemption options for their employees who work at their Riverside headquarters. They provided us with a list of those local businesses, and offered to handle the fulfillment themselves if we could ensure they were made available in the Store. This is obviously not a standard offering for us today, and it required creative, collaborative thinking on our part to land a solution. Emma, thank you for developing a proposed process and moving it forward by bringing all of the key stakeholders together across our respective teams. This laid the foundation for us to make this proposal a reality. James, thank you for developing and approving a new process to issue quarterly credit notes to offset Stellar Energy's fulfillment costs. Michael, thank you for doing the work needed to ensure these new process and platform updates made it into the most recent release window - and Tyler, thank you for quickly posting the local vendor gift cards to the Store in short order! Last but not least, Daniel, thank you for ensuring we kept both our company's and Stellar Energy's interests at heart, facilitating the implementation every step of the way. Each of you and your respective teammates and leaders played a crucial role in making this happen. We have greatly strengthened our relationship with the client as a result. Thanks again!
award_title: Energizing Bruce Power's Local Redemption Options!

To the entire Opex team, I would like to take this opportunity to acknowledge our collective achievements throughout 2025. Together, we have accomplished so much! The Payroll team successfully completed the migration to ADP UK and transitioned the weekly payroll to a monthly cycle. These were two major undertakings that required meticulous planning and precise execution to ensure a smooth and successful rollout. The FA team have made significant progress with the indirect PO project. This initiative has been an ambition of ours for several years, and seeing it finally come to fruition is just fantastic. When fully rolled out it will make an immense difference to spend management, accounting and controls. We also delivered successfully on audits and statutory accounts, both of which represent substantial commitments for the team. In addition, David has played an instrumental role in the Stripe project, with Phase I scheduled to go live in January. I could highlight many more milestones, but it is sufficient to say that this has been a momentous year for the Opex team. I am extremely proud of everything we have achieved together.

I feel like I am asking that question of you every day ‚Äì some new, ah-hoc, oddball data pull to support our event promo work.  This week was no different.  As we are working to sell sponsorships to Live, we have been asked about various audience demographics to help the target sponsors evaluate the fit.  One quick ask of you, and in a flash was the data pull ready for me to do some analysis on.  Thank you for the support, the speed, and partnership in enabling me to tell the right story in the market.
