The presentation went well and highlighted all the magnificent work the teams got through this year.

Congratulations on winning 2nd Place for Most Innovative Mindset innovation award. You tackled one of the toughest challenges in engineering: modernising a 20-year-old legacy application without slowing the business down. Rather than spending weeks manually untangling 26,000+ lines of tightly coupled code, this team used Claude Code to map dependencies, analyse complexity, and prototype solutions in hours instead of weeks. You accelerated legacy analysis from ten days to one, cut prototyping time by more than half, and even used AI to improve onboarding for new engineers.  You embraced challenges, learned fast, and proved that modernising legacy systems doesn‚Äôt have to be painful‚Äîit can be intelligent, iterative, and empowering.  Congratulations for demonstrating innovative thinking and for showing how AI can turn uncertainty into clarity at remarkable speed.

Congratulations on your Quack innovation, that gives us a glimpse into the future of intelligent, AI-Native development.  This is a complex innovation so for the Innovation POC  - focusing on the ECR vulnerabilities to demonstrate a thin slice of what Quack can do was an impressive approach. Developers have long faced a painful, repetitive workflow whenever a new vulnerability alert arrives, dig through the email, understand the issue, research the impact, open tickets, notify security, prepare code fixes, and push changes. It‚Äôs slow, it‚Äôs manual, and it pulls focus away from meaningful engineering work. Quack changes that completely. You created an AI-driven workflow that automatically identifies vulnerability notifications, interprets their content, investigates the issue, and generates a clear, structured ticket, complete with impact, proposed fixes, and assigned tasks. From there, developers step in to handle code changes: cloning the repository, creating a feature branch, preparing fixes, and sending them for human-in-the-loop approval before committing and pushing. It‚Äôs an end-to-end, intelligent pipeline that transforms what used to be a multi-step manual process into a streamlined, automated flow while keeping engineers firmly in control at the right checkpoints. This project shows what‚Äôs possible when we combine secure automation with thoughtful human oversight. It‚Äôs bold, it‚Äôs forward-looking, and it demonstrates real potential to enhance productivity across our engineering organisation. You are the driving team behind Quack, pushing the boundaries of what developer automation can achieve. Congratulations!
award_title: Innovation Award Most Innovative Mindset 1st Prize

message: Daniel, thank you for stepping into my shoes during my recent absence and at really late notice to present the performance dashboard for Project Phoenix. It's such a great asset to a team knowing there is always someone as willing and capable as you are, ready to step up and help out in times of need. Really appreciate it.

Congratulations on winning the 3rd Place for Most Innovative Mindset to this team who created DataQuery AI, an AI assistant designed to make working with complex databases more accessible. You addressed a challenge many of us face: navigating large datasets and relying heavily on documentation or expert support to get accurate answers. Your solution enables both technical and non-technical users to retrieve data through simple natural-language queries, helping reduce friction and improve clarity. DataQuery AI handles a wide range of use cases, presents results cleanly with supporting metadata, and has already shown potential for reuse, including possibility for integration with other innovation projects like Incident Intelligence. You also demonstrated a thoughtful approach to prompt design, continuous learning, and adapting as AI tools evolve. Well done for your practical and forward-looking innovation POC.

Congratulation on winning the Best Overall Innovation Award. Your Automated Translations innovation will make a meaningful difference for engineering teams across our entire organisation. As a global platform operating in more than 120 countries and supporting 40 languages, translations are part of our everyday reality. But for far too long, the process has been slow, manual, and frustrating. A single word change taking up to 10 days simply isn't acceptable in todays fast paced world. This team tackled that head-on with an innovation POC. By shifting from human-driven to AI-powered translations, integrating TranslateFlow's deployment workflows, and enabling faster, self-service releases through paved paths, you've reimagined the entire translation pipeline. What once took days could now be completed in one to two days, and during your demo we even saw updates appear in 20 minutes. The potential impact speaks for itself: - Up to 80% reduction in engineering overhead - Around 70% cost savings - Dramatically reduced waiting times and frustration for every squad that deals with multilingual content This is exactly the kind of innovation that lifts the whole organisation: practical, scalable, and immediately valuable. Congratulations again - you are setting a powerful standard for what thoughtful automation can achieve.

Congratulations on winning the 2nd Prize for Popular Choice award for your innovation project that resonates deeply with engineers across the organisation: Automated README File Creation. Every one of us knows the struggle‚Äîtechnical documentation is essential, but creating it consistently is slow, manual, and often deprioritised. That leads to onboarding challenges, gaps in cross-team understanding, and extra time wasted investigating issues. This team saw that pain clearly and built something genuinely impactful. Your solution automates high-quality README creation using a standardised AI prompt, powered by tools we already have through our enterprise agreements. The result is consistent, accurate documentation generated in minutes, not hours, complete with change history, architectural context, and links to supporting materials. Even better, these files can be automatically connected to our central ops-level repository for easy access. You rigorously tested the approach across multiple technologies, aligned the structure with the Pioneers and Neptune framework, and produced a clear, practical model for wider adoption. The benefits are straightforward: faster onboarding, stronger code comprehension, reduced investigative overhead, and documentation that can even serve as a trusted data source for future AI agents. This is smart, pragmatic innovation‚Äîsolving a universal engineering frustration with a repeatable and scalable solution. Congratulations again, your innovation has the potential to make documentation easier, faster, and far more consistent across our engineering community.

I want to take this opportunity to thank you all for your dedication and commitment in delivering Phoenix Corp's customer commitments ahead of schedule! From the outset, we faced an aggressive timeline, and despite last-minute changes and evolving requirements, you came together as a team to deliver ahead of time‚Äîenabling Phoenix Corp to test and train their users in time for their planned January re-launch. This is a significant achievement and a testament to your hard work and collaboration. On a personal note, I am so grateful to work with such talented, dedicated, and caring colleagues. Each and every one of you go out of your way to support one another, and that teamwork makes all the difference. Thank you!

message: Hi Folks, As the year end approaches, I've been reflecting on what was a really tough year and I keep coming back to all of you and how you showed up through it all. Leadership isn't about titles. It's about the quiet consistency. The way you show up for your teams, even on the hard days. Especially on the hard days! This year threw a lot our way. And through it all, you showed up, with grace, with determination, and with an unwavering commitment to our people. I've seen you lead with empathy and integrity, even when things were unclear. Here's to the moments you celebrated others, the tough calls you made with heart, and the example you continue to set. I'm so grateful to be alongside you in this work here at TalentFirst and still believe we have the opportunity to shape something truly unique. Looking forward to 2026 and a year of positive change. If change is the only constant, it will be nice for us to drive changes that are all about growth and development for us all. You are all truly appreciated. Thank you. Daniel

message: Hi team, As we look to close out the year, there is one thing I keep coming back to.... This year threw a LOT at us. We faced hard decisions. We said goodbye to people we care about. We felt the weight of change, and still, this team kept moving. Across both hiring and brand, your resilience has been something to witness. You didn't just hold the line, you kept building. When hiring slowed, you focused on the work behind the scenes: improving processes, tightening operations, setting us up for what's next. And now, as things have ramped up again and we faced a significant backlog with fewer hands, you're showing up with the same tenacity and drive. I know it hasn't been easy. But your ability to stay focused, deliver with integrity, and keep pushing forward is what makes this team what it is. Thank you for showing up, for each other, and for the business. I truly appreciate you all. Here's to an exciting 2026 as we finally get to look at our systems transformation and a future-ready org and operating model. Daniel
nominator_title: Senior Director, Global Talent Acquisition and Employer Branding

Through this process we've learned together and have a better sense of what to expect in the new wave of launches for Q1. We'll have new hire support in hand to start next year, but until then well done making this happen!

It is clear when comparing our quarterly team sessions that we are consistently improving, our strategies are sharper, our alignment on team structures is stronger, and our focus on key goals is more unified than ever before. Personally, I found these sessions to be an incredible learning experience. The insights you contributed not only broadened my understanding but also reinforced the importance of collaboration in driving meaningful outcomes. I am deeply grateful for the effort, preparation, and thoughtfulness that each of you invested in making these meetings so productive. Looking ahead, I am confident that the progress we have made together has paved the way for an outstanding 2026. With the momentum we have built, the clarity of our shared vision, and the strength of our collective expertise, I believe we are positioned to achieve remarkable success in the year ahead. Thank you once again for your dedication, your contributions, and your commitment to excellence. I look forward to continuing this journey with all of you and to seeing the impact we will create together. And as always, great to enjoy some time together in person outside of work!

Anne-Marie, I wanted to take a moment to recognize you for the incredible support and partnership you've provided as we've been navigating accessibility requirements for our enterprise clients like Microsoft and Fidelity. When I first started diving into this work, I had no idea just how complex accessibility compliance really is: the layers of WCAG standards, the nuances of different assistive technologies, the unique implementation challenges each enterprise brings. You've been absolutely exemplary in helping me understand all of this, and honestly, the knowledge I've gained through working with you has been transformative. What I appreciate most is how proactive you are. You don't just answer my questions; you anticipate what I'll need to know, share context before I even realize I need it, and make sure I truly understand the "why" behind the requirements. :)  Even though we haven't completed this journey yet, I already feel so much more confident in how I approach accessibility considerations in our product development. That's entirely because of your guidance and the way you make collaboration not just productive, but truly enjoyable. Thank you for being such a wonderful partner in this. I'm grateful for everything you've taught me and excited to continue learning from you as we move forward together!

I want to take a moment to share just how deeply grateful I am for the tremendous effort you each put into making our recent Bloomberg feature a reality. So when she reached out asking whether we had customers rewarding employees who experiment with AI, I knew we had one shot to deliver.  Erika, from the second I reached out, you were all over it‚Äîidentifying paths forward, connecting the dots and opening the right doors. Your support, customer knowledge and constant check-ins were critical to securing the ‚Äúyes‚Äù from Sanofi. Even though those leads didn't materialize for this story, your willingness to jump in without hesitation truly embodied the teamwork that made this win possible.  Meghan and Sophia, your strategic insights and transparency not only helped us zero in on Sanofi as the right fit, but ensured we approached them the right way. Thank you for hearing me out, clearing the runway and co-signing this initiative.  Lynette, your persistence in securing the final approval was nothing short of heroic. Weeks of strategic and timely follow-ups resulted in full approval from a massive global enterprise‚Äîand a quote that celebrates Workhuman‚Äôs role in one of the world‚Äôs most influential global business publications. Carla, you remind us that the simplest things often carry the greatest power. Less is more; the bowl holds water only because of its empty space. It‚Äôs this quiet, effortless wisdom woven into your nature that made you pause and ask, ‚ÄúWhy are agents requesting to reassign cases to another queue?‚Äù  We asked around. No one had an answer, not a real one, anyway. So we followed the Way: we let things be simple. ‚ÄúAssign them to the other queue yourselves,‚Äù we said. And so they did. And the flow was restored, and once again, harmony returned to the land.

Yesterday was an evening that really called for true teamwork. I know it‚Äôs not easy when the calls just keep coming in, and I wanted to thank you all for holding down the fort. I truly appreciate every one of you!

Hey guys,  Just wanted to say thank you for last night. You stayed behind to help our customers and some of us attended to the party.   Unfortunately the volumes  were not small and calls piled up, but you guys did your best in every aspect and it is much appreciated.  Go team!

Paulo and Robin, thank you for observing CPU and memory, and for comparing the system‚Äôs performance against days gone by. Your careful watching prompted a user survey, a small ripple leading to more attention and investigation. As you continue, doing startup settings tests and reporting any issues, you help with inching closer to a solution.

I wanted to say a quick thank you for your help last night! You all really helped me when I got stuck and although it might have seemed like something small to you it really made me feel like I can count on you so thank you!!

Thanks so much for doing an amazing job at presenting yesterday in front of the team the work done on integrating AI on the DS! The presentations where fun, easy to follow and super interesting! A lot of work went on those presentations! and it's always daunting to present in front of the team so well done to the 3 of you!!!!

Tina, thank you for looking into the cancelled award with such insight. With your deep understanding and intuitive sense of the system, you uncovered the simple solution that had been hiding right under our noses, and identified all the details the client requested. Your clarity turns complexity into something effortless, and for that, the path feels a little smoother.
award_title: Finding Simplicity in the Hidden Details

message: Sharon, there are those rare moments when the universe folds six paths into one, and a single person walks them all with grace. You refresh the IT reports, tend to the tickets, create Jira feedback, and send it forth, tasks usually carried by many hands, yet somehow resting lightly in yours.  In the Tao, effort dissolves when the spirit is aligned. You don‚Äôt work more time; you simply bend time around you. What would exhaust a small village, you handle with the calm of someone sweeping leaves from a quiet temple courtyard.  We see it. We appreciate it. And in the great balance of things, your presence keeps the whole place flowing just a little more smoothly, a little more peacefully.

Hey Team, I just want to say thanks for all the time you‚Äôve given me over the last few months. Moving from automation into backend dev has been a big shift, and I genuinely appreciate the patience, guidance, and knowledge you‚Äôve shared. It‚Äôs made the transition far smoother, and I‚Äôm grateful for the support. Looking forward to contributing more as I keep ramping up.
award_title: Thanks for your patience and knowledge sharing

message: Aastha, I want to send a long-overdue thank you for everything you do for the team ‚Äî especially your work on delivering the initial Out-of-the-Box Spend 2.0 UI this quarter. This achievement is significant as it will serve as the foundation for the Spend 2.0 initiatives we will focus on in 2026. Your dedication, forward-thinking approach, and commitment to quality are inspirational. Thank you for setting such a high standard and for helping to position us for future success!

Thanks Tihana for covering last night my absence and staying behind protecting our customers and of course agents.   With a small team that was left behind, volume was increased, and not only for the CSE's but for you as well with multiple questions from the team, CSM's emails pouring over and needed to be looked after.   Appreciate your sense of teamwork and next year it's your turn to party!

You gave up your time to look over my findings with Benjamin Moore and Lurie to not only help resolve issues but more importantly confirm that i wasn't loosing my mind during one of those weeks. Maya, i just want to say a massive thank you for your help and support, as always you never hesitate to give up your time to help me find answers buried deep in documentation. I really appreciate your time and knowledge, it means an awful lot to have your support as an excellent teammate. Thank You, Thank You, Thank You, !!!

Sofia, thank you so much for all the amazing work you did recently with MediCore and organizing all their translations in one place.  When configuring this client and when we were close to push live the PM flagged that all the translation works done during launch had reverted. This wasn't an easy task as we didn't have a master file with all translations and had to puzzle everything into one piece.  Once you got looped into this project you immediately rolled up your sleeves and put all old and new translations into one place and you even added notes and text properties to it. In addition to this you kept all stakeholders updated, raised new tickets (with Design Team) and kept following up with other teams when needed!! Please know that you are very cherished and appreciated! Thank you for being so awesome.

For anyone reading this - if you want to see what Jordan sent - ask he or I - otherwise, I'll focus on the incredible response below. Quite frankly - the personalized email mentioning following us on LinkedIn plus quoting a recent post was incredible and triggered the following from a Senior Manager at a Top account - "Hi Jordan. Thank you so much for reaching out; your message truly made my day. I appreciate you taking the time to read and reflect on my post. Authenticity has been a cornerstone of my leadership journey, so it means a lot to hear that it resonated with you and aligns so closely with PeopleFirst's mission.   I've gone ahead and scheduled a time for us to connect on the 15th, and I'm really looking forward to the conversation. I'm always inspired by organizations that champion belonging and inclusivity, and I'd welcome the chance to learn more about PeopleFirst and explore where our perspectives intersect.   Thanks again for the thoughtful note, and I'll see you soon.  Incredible thoughtful work, Jordan! appreciate you!

Alex, I sent over a rough, last-minute image for social and you transformed it into something polished and professional --> fast. Thanks for elevating the work so the post could go live today.   Your creativity, craft, and speed made all the difference!
Wonderful work, Marcus! Congratulations on achieving a perfect score ( 100%) on our November quiz!
Wishing you the happiest of birthdays Daniel - hope you have a great day with your family and can celebrate as much as you deserve.

Emma, thank you for jumping into the data slide work with such openness and collaboration. This project is a big one with plenty of eyes on it, and your ability to ask smart questions, dig into the details, and deliver high-quality work makes a huge difference. You bring clarity, excellence, and partnership to the table. This effort requires strong teamwork, and I'm grateful to have you as a collaborator as we move it forward.

Ryan, I'm so grateful for the positive energy and diligence you bring every single day. You're always deep in a project, raising your hand to support someone, or finding ways to make the team feel connected ‚Äî whether through a Christmas swap or some other delightful surprise. You have a way of bringing people together in the best possible way, and it lifts all of us up. Thanks for being such a steady, joyful force on the team.

Sam and Tyler - thank you both for quickly responding when I was in search of visuals for slideware. Its a small thing, I know, but makes a big impact on what I'm doing. Tyler, your designs for the holiday party set a nice tone that I was able to riff off of for our Q4 meeting. And Sam, I was so relieved to get the exact right visual for the product callouts - saving me the time of having to create something new. Appreciate you both!!

message: It was fantastic to see such a significant milestone go live yesterday - the fact that we're now able to limit data access at the report level, rather than applying limitations to the underlying data sources, means that we can prevent data access 'leaking' between reports and being a constant source of confusion for customers and internal stakeholders alike.  As well as the consumers of these reports, this is also a significant win for Report Authors, who have, until now, not been able to verify the contents of reports they create and share. For the first time, they will now be able to see the same restrictions being applied in these reports as the recipients of the reports themselves.  Thank you all for your excellent work to plan, deliver and thoroughly test this incredibly complex change! This is going to be solely responsible for a significant boost in customer satisfaction, and will pave the way for us to be able to migrate more customers away from legacy reporting systems in the near future.

Hey SPS mates, I wanted to take a moment to recognize all the help and support you showed me towards this month end. message: Thanks everyone for the collaboration, the animated discussions, and all the work in JIRA to get our Q1 plans ready for presentation this week. We‚Äôre now aligned on our priorities and goals for Q1 and in a great position to hit the ground running in January. Bravo!

The initiative to review the PKB, the organization and the ability to empower the council has led to a successful partnership with our product teams. Then today we had our quarterly meeting to review where we have been in 2025 and the journey we are on together in 2026.  This session was inspirational and informative.  Your dedication to making sure the details like the agenda, speakers, and presentation were all accounted for even though you were under the weather and traveling for customers. From collaborating on certifications like Recognition Programs, Budget Management, and Events, to building the Project Dashboard that gives us leaders clear oversight on tickets, workload, SLA compliance, and QA readiness‚Äîyou've delivered tools that have greatly improved our ability to manage and prioritize effectively. More recently, your initiative in vetting TaskFlow as a potential resource and collaborating with me to gather feedback has been incredibly valuable, as well as your troubleshooting help with Project Management System prioritization. message: Riley, Thank you for being such a strong supporter of the Nova Design System. You set a great example of how a PM can work with a design system by making sure it's reused as much as possible, helping us untangle dependencies, and finding ways to avoid rebuilding the same components again and again. It's the smartest way to build products, even if it's not always the easiest, and yesterday you showed real openness as we worked through solutions together.  Thank you for your patience, your hard work, and for rolling with our way of working.  You really are our best ally.

Thanks for putting together such an engaging and thoughtfully orchestrated Product Design Experience Day for my daughter last week for her 'Bring your Daughter to Work' Day. She thoroughly enjoyed the day with your team and it opened her eyes to the world of design and what's involved behind the scenes. Maybe I'll get some respect at home now for how complex this Technology stuff really is‚Ä¶ üòÜ

Marcus, I want to take a moment to recognize the recent work you've done on the financial reporting system. As our primary financial reporting tool, the system is critical to successful financial closes, and your work will significantly strengthen its governance and controls. From engaging with stakeholders to understand reporting needs, resolving drill-down functionality queries with the development team, and implementing access restrictions to reduce risk‚Äîyou've tackled a wide range of challenges and brought much-needed structure to how we manage the system. Your focus on innovation and quality has been evident throughout. The next step is for our teams to invest more time in 2026 on training and building knowledge to fully leverage the system's capabilities. Great work, Marcus‚Äîwell done!

Jordan, well done on everything you've accomplished since returning from maternity leave. Your innovative approach to tracking launches with an impressive, well-structured file will add real value and will compliment the detailed records maintained for each launch - I really look forward to seeing this become fully established. You've also done a fantastic job getting to grips with internal control packs around the monthly reporting process for the first time and preparing an informative pack that highlighted key changes for our monthly Tax team meeting, already exploring more efficient ways to build these packs. I've received extremely positive feedback from key stakeholders in the Tax team about your collaborative partnership with them‚Äîan essential factor in ensuring accurate tax compliance within our AR and Master Data processes. And you've achieved all of this with your trademark approach of teamwork, collaboration, and professionalism.

Taylor, I just want to take a moment to recognize you for all the incredible support and the amazing job you've done since stepping into your new role as Associate Manager in Sourcing. You've brought such great energy and drive to the team, and it's clear you're already making a big impact in such a short time. You've shown yourself to be a true team player, and it's been fantastic working closely together again. I'm excited to see all the great things you'll continue to achieve!

message: Team - a massive thank you to all of your for participating in the Recruitment and Hiring process for our two open AE positions in Mid-Market! Despite not having any advanced notice or knowledge of the subject, you didn't miss a beat, leading the remainder of the call with poise and confidence. Your calm demeanor and expertise assured the Phoenix Corp team they're in good hands. These little moments have a big impact on our entire team's ongoing relationship with the client. I couldn't be more excited and it's because of you. Thank you again so very much.

I love to see how proactive you have been in driving forward these initiatives. For example, one key focus area has been to really understand why customers have historically delayed launches, and once we understand the major themes, building out plays and different strategies to address those common delays to minimize risk in the future for new launches. You took that initiative right on, leveraging AI Assistant to help summarize the major themes. Another fantastic example to call out is your focus on expanding the expertise across the team to be able to leverage all of Launch in sales/prospect meetings. In our recent Launch Review, you came up with the great idea to bring Quinn into the session, and you two built a phenomenal enablement session to support the initiative to expand our team's expertise. Lastly, I want to thank you for your dedication to continuous improvement when it comes to how we report out on Launch. From innovating the deck and insights provided, to creating a more automated way to populate the key launch insights and data points needed, we have made great strides here! message: Taylor, I would like to acknowledge your excellent management of a delicate customer request regarding communication records. The ask was support for 80+ employees who had left the company and the requirement to have their communication data in a digestible manner. Usually from a compliance perspective, we have been asked to provide pdfs but this is not scalable and can not be delivered for larger populations. You leaned into what was available, providing this in a timely and thoughtful manner ensuring it was fit for purpose and the feedback was positive. Thank you for the consideration that you gave to the request and response which sets us up for success with similar situations. Great work and thank you!

Jordan - Recently Sarah at TechCorp shared that she is departing the organization soon. What followed was a verbal confession of her adoration of you, being her favorite contact from all 13 vendors that she deals with today. You are such a wonderful partner to your clients. I hope you know that you bring amazing value in every interaction. Thank you for being awesome!

Marcus, thank you for your ongoing support for GlobalMining Inc, it's great to have you working with the team and joining the weekly calls. On this morning's call, the team & I appreciated you sharing the test environment and calling out the system updates awaiting their review. It is helpful to hear directly from the team and having your expertise to address their queries. Great work & thank you!

Riley ‚Äî your determination and persistence with BusinessNews have truly paid off. Ever since you joined TechFlow, I've watched you consistently pursue a mention in BusinessNews's work and careers business section. Through countless pitches, creative angles, thoughtful conversations, and many cycles of trying, learning, and refining, you made it happen. Your hard work has resulted in an outstanding mention in one of the world's most influential global media outlets. It's a powerful reminder that PR is a long game, and you know exactly how to play it. Cheers to you!

Guys, thanks so much for your support and training with the month end close. It was my first time doing it and it was messy due to Black Friday and Cyber Monday. I needed support and was very relieved to be able to count on both of you to guide me to completion. Thanks so much :)

I wanted to extend a heartfelt thank you for the time and guidance you've given me while training me on the Project Management Dashboard and helping me prepare to present it to the team. Your clarity, patience, and encouragement made all the difference, and I truly appreciate how you led the discussion and supported me throughout the process. Thank you for empowering me to step into this with confidence. I'm genuinely grateful for your mentorship.

Casey, well done on completing your first official month-end close. We didn't have the easiest start this time‚Äîwith Cyber Monday pushing everything out by a day, two team members out sick, and it being your first time handling the invoice reconciliation. Despite all of that, you still managed to complete the rec on your own and with 100% accuracy. Your support has made a real difference this month-end. Well done, and thank you so much.

Thank you, team, for throwing yourselves into what first looked like a mountain of Accessibility issues and turning it into real progress. Your dedication to tackling each item, testing it thoroughly, and keeping the momentum going has paid off big time ‚Äî over 70% of the issues are already sorted! Fantastic work all around. Let's keep that energy rolling as we push toward compliance certification!

Morgan, just wanted to say thank you for all your hard work in the lead up to our holiday kickoff. We had a lot coming our way with annual leave balances, changing staffing levels, and scheduling team meetings, and your flexibility is truly appreciated. The work is already showing through in our SLAs, and the impact is clear. Great work!
nominator_title: Associate Manager, Customer Service Workforce Management

message: Thanks for joining the workshop and sparking some great conversation. We made some great progress towards the target state and also chatted through some nitty gritty issues such as user tagging, hash tags, rich text, migration, history and much more!

Devon- you've been crushing the confusing conversations around our API connections so that all of our data is beautifully mapped into our analytics platform for relaunch next year! The time and patience doesn't go unnoticed. You also were so willing to jump in and help with our Paid Search relaunch with the last minute December funds. Brand Paid Search wouldn't be in the spot its in without your search expertise! Thanks for helping out under pressure/crunch time while heading into the holidays!
award_title: Data and Dashboarding our way to December

message: Sam, thank you for being the operational backbone of our team and the metaphorical external hard drive for our paid media team, housing all day to day operational knowledge. Your organization, speed, and absolute mastery of every process/workflow/behind-the-scenes detail make you the person I rely on more than anyone. Whether it's the paid social creative best-practices doc you built, somehow distilling hundreds of nuances into a clean, usable table, or the UTM builder you keep perfectly updated every quarter, or the plug-and-play paid media brief deck you created for every campaign launch, or the work you've done being the first to dive into trafficking ads in our social platform now that we've taken those processes in house, everything you touch becomes clearer, easier, and more efficient for the entire team and gets stored in this metaphorical external hard drive for all of us to reference while executing day to day campaign/program management. But the thing I appreciate most, which may sound trivial and elementary is your note taking. Your meeting/call notes function like my own personal AI memory bank: anytime I forget an action item, an instruction, or something we discussed, I Slack you (usually starting with "sorry, I know I've asked you this 100 times before but..."), and within minutes you send back the exact details I need. You never complain, you always show up, and you always have a well organized, thorough answer. Your operational excellence keeps us moving forward, and your memory keeps me afloat. Thank you for being the most reliable, organized, and indispensable source of truth for all things paid media. We're better because of you!
award_title: The Human External Hard Drive Award

message: Devon, on behalf of the Paid Media team, thank you so much for the diligence you have demonstrated in setting up our API reporting tokens across 5 key platforms. There were unique challenges faced in this project: different APIs for each platform depending on ad type, applications to submit for custom approval of "app setup", error codes/roadblocks that only online forums and AI tools could answer for you in a timely manner. In the past, we relied on agency and platform sales rep support for answers. In this new way of working, you are more agile and self-service. While we will bring on the Principal Analyst role soon to help, this has been an extra project outside of your day-to-day scope. Well done problem solving and rallying for the benefit of the whole team!

Hi Lauren, I just wanted to drop you a quick note of thanks for again jumping on to share your knowledge and expertise with the EB team. You have been so giving of your time as we try to uplift our data and reporting capabilities for our media campaigns, now we have our new careers site in place. Particularly with this last call being on a short Thanksgiving week, I thought it was fitting that we share our thanks for your support. Thank you and have a wonderful family break. Michael (and Chris).
nominator_title: Senior Director, Global Talent Acquisition and Employer Branding

message: Sam, on this Thanksgiving week I would like to express how grateful I am to have you on the Paid Media team. This is our second Turkey Day together at TalentTech, although I'm proud we've known each other longer. Reflecting on your contribution, I see you are especially gifted with proactivity, respectfulness and clarity in communication, bravery in presenting, systematic organization, thoroughness, and intellect. This year has been especially turbulent‚Äîbut I can see your accomplishments clearly: owning the full lifecycle of our annual conference advertising, executing on the product intelligence event and upper funnel brand effort, more independence in vendor research, supporting the meteoric new brand initiative, overhauling our utm trafficking doc taxonomy, and so much more. You are also a warm person to spend time with, empathetic and ready for a laugh. Celebrating your perfect coastal wedding at the top of this very month felt like a milestone for our whole team, knowing how much of your personal effort and dreams went into everything. Cheers to the next chapter‚Äîbuilding on the land in the suburbs and building your career at TalentTech!

Devon, on this Thanksgiving week I would like to express how grateful I am to have you on the Paid Media team. This is our fifth(?!) Turkey Day together at TalentTech and I've lost track on the overall count since our previous companies days. Feels like at least over half our careers, no? I remember pre-TalentTech thinking that this guy really CARES about getting the job done right but is also so playful. It's a careful balance‚Äîbut somehow it's Devon! If there was a competition of Devon vs AI on campaign troubleshooting, you would win‚Äîbut as we've seen recently Devon + AI takes things to the next level. Taking Paid Media in-house is possible with talent like yours on the team, knowing we have core senior expertise in the search and social platforms in particular. Thanks for plugging along all these years. It's been fun seeing how your life outside of work has blossomed over the last few years‚Äîwith baby Emma as the star newcomer of 2025. May you have a lovely holiday time with family and friends this week. Cheers!

In the spirit of Thanksgiving and with the end of the year edging closer I just wanted to take a moment to say a heartfelt thank you. Working with such a supportive, collaborative, and genuinely uplifting group of people makes all the difference. I'm grateful for the way everyone shows up for one another, shares ideas freely, and helps create an environment where we can all do our best work. Thank you for being an incredible team ‚Äî I truly appreciate each of you.

Team, I want to take a moment to call out the teamwork last week to ensure that we had the smoothest week, weekend and cyber Monday that we have probably ever had. I know under the surface we were paddling on a few things, but everything went without a hitch. Ryan and Alex, you juggled network slowness and last minute notifications with ease. Jamie you ensured the coverage and also helped all the teams fit in their holidays so that no-one is risking losing days at the end of the year. Chris, a multitude of meetings, hosting several providers onsite and remotely as well as prepping for one of our biggest customer feedback events of the year. Its an efficient and effective team that the customer receives the benefit from. Well done!

Thanks for your contribution to date during our bi-weekly FA/FPA meetings. Together we are making significant progress across a number of topics including GL coding & descriptions, indirect PO, Fastclose reporting and other related topics. I really appreciate your value added participation at meetings. Having open lines of communication and sharing of knowledge is highly beneficial and supports the delivery of complete and accurate accounting.

Hi Marcus, I wanted to acknowledge the tremendous work you've been doing (alone) to support the ongoing design efforts happening across Phoenix, Nexus, Elite Recognition, Content Manager and the Feedback Platform. There's so many moving parts, and the combination of design changes, difficult conversations, pushback and research makes it easy to underestimate the amount of work and energy required to keep all these areas aligned, while pushing for solid WCAG compliance across the board. You're doing an outstanding job. Thanks for your commitment, leadership and passion for your work. But please remember to look after yourself as well üíú Sincere thanks, Sarah

Jessica and Rachel - thank you for the incredible work you're doing to ensure our new sales reps get up to speed ASAP! You've designed a plan to ensure we keep up the momentum without cutting corners. Thank you for your diligent efforts - I am positive we will see early success as a result!

Team, thanks so much to each of you for covering my tickets and projects while I was on leave. I really appreciate you picking up the task items that needed attention while I was away and keeping an eye on my authentication project. Super grateful to have you all! Stay the best ;)

Just wanted to take a moment to say thank you for covering the inbox/ status report during the holiday while the rest of the team was out for Thanksgiving. The inbox was fairly busy, and you helped keep everything at a manageable level, which made things so much smoother when we all returned!!

Thank you all so much for the grace and kindness you showed me today. Receiving news this morning during our standup left me more emotional than I expected. Thank you so much for swooping in and grabbing some of my tickets. Your support, understanding, and willingness to step in and take work off my plate meant more than I can express. I'm truly grateful to be part of a team that cares this much. Thank you for holding space for me as I grieve.
award_title: Thank you for the shoulder to lean on

message: Rebecca, I want to recognize your exceptional openness to feedback and your unwavering energy. You consistently show up ready to collaborate, roll up your sleeves, and put new strategies into action. I truly appreciate your willingness to experiment, iterate, and bring fresh ideas to the table. Your attitude sets a powerful tone for the team ‚Äî please keep the insights and innovative thinking coming.
Thank you for the clear explanation on the ticket system, from now on I will know how to open a ticket to update the account page.

Dear Michael, on behalf of our group- People leader, I want to extend my appreciation for joining our "New Year kick off 2026 Group Strategy Workshop" and taking time to share your thoughts and examples on Team Tenets. Your session was impactful ‚Äî it helped the group connect the theory to real scenarios and encouraged folks to align around what it truly means to operate as a first team. Your contribution planted important seeds of collaboration and common purpose. Thank you for helping shape that conversation. I would also like to acknowledge and appreciate the strong collaboration demonstrated between us. The way you partnered to guide this discussion set a powerful example to our PEs and EMs ‚Äî showcasing what first-team alignment looks like in practice. It reinforced the message that leadership unity drives clarity, confidence, sharing and inspiration across teams. "Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success." ‚Äì Henry Ford

Amanda, I wanted to recognise the remarkable leadership you bring to our team and indeed TechFlow every single day. No matter what challenges come our way, you have an extraordinary ability to approach each one with clarity, mindfulness, and purpose. You consistently see a path forward even when it isn't obvious to anyone else, and your ability to find the good, shine a light on it, and lead from that place is truly exceptional. You navigate the team through what often feels like endless minefields of complexity, yet you do so with calm strength, strategic insight, and a belief in what we can achieve together. What makes your leadership even more inspiring is that you never focus solely on delivery outcomes, you invest just as much energy in the career, personal development, and growth of the people around you as engineers and as leaders. It's a privilege to work under someone who not only leads with conviction, but who consistently sees far beyond what's immediately in front of us. Your guidance, resilience, and vision set a standard that inspires everyone around you. Thank you for everything you do and for being an exceptional role model.

David, words hardly capture how much you have influenced my experience at TechFlow, but I want to try. From meeting you as the hiring manager during my interview for the software engineer role on the analytics platform, to today where I am an engineering manager for mobile and you are the director for customer solutions, you have consistently offered guidance, support and encouragement. You have backed me when I needed it most. From you nominating me for the Rising Star category in the Diversity in Tech Awards to working with you in the metrics group and on developer experience reports, I have valued every opportunity to learn from you. Much of my leadership style has grown from watching how you lead, how you build and care for teams and how you motivate and inspire people. I have always felt that you were in my corner and knowing that your support was there has pushed me forward at every stage. Thank you for leading and guiding me over the past four years. The lessons you have shared will stay with me ü§ó

Lisa thank you so much for the support you have given me in the past 3.5 years. It all started from a conversation at the summer party to you taking me under your wing and giving me direction. When I had my first speaking opportunity, you sat in meeting rooms to gave me feedback on how I was presenting. When I had the interview for the senior role, you hopped on a call to talk me through how to prepare. When I came to you with situations I needed navigating you talked me through how you would handle it and how gave me recommendations. When I was feeling overwhelmed you directed me to list what was consuming my time and figure out a priority list. You have been an incredible mentor to me the past few years and I wanted to say a big thank you. You have made the parts of leadership I was fearful of that bit easier to navigate. I will endeavour to "work with my strengths" and make sure I bring out the strengths of the people around me. I will be paying forward all that you have done. Thanks Lisa ü§ó
Your quick actions today made sure our campaign was ready to launch to our customers on schedule, thank you for your willingness to jump in and your attention to detail!

Sophie, I want to recognise you for your incredible curiosity, energy, and eagerness to learn. In just two hours with you, I could clearly see your drive to understand every detail and get things right the first time. You're genuinely impressive, and I'm excited to see how successful you're going to be. You're already on such a strong path ‚Äî keep shining! üí´

Taylor & Jordan, thank you so much for taking some time out of your very busy schedules to put together a resume ranker prototype to help filter through the extremely high volume of applicants we have received for the NLP Data Scientist opening. I am so impressed with its capabilities and it has already saved me SO much time I would have spent manually parsing through resumes. Your resourcefulness and willingness to approach this hire as a team truly makes all the difference. I have screens scheduled with the highest ranking applicants already and am excited to see how this will enhance our pipeline.
Thanks for your work on business topics and congratulations on delivering your first production model!
Thank you for your work on competency analysis v3! Thanks to your efforts we added tons more skills, the ability to customize taxonomies, and improved the experience on the AI Assistant. Kudos!

Alex - You have take the manager role to a whole new level. Your level of commitment is outstanding. I feel like you listen and take action. Besides all the tasks at work, you're back in school crushing exams, papers and reading 300 pages a day. LOL. I just want to thank you for all you do.

Hi Morgan I just wanted to personally thank you for the incredible thoughtfulness you bring to everything you do. From organizing our team night out at the local pub to the games and every detail of our team events, you create experiences with such care, intention, and flawless execution. What truly makes you special is how you think about each and every one of us. You personalize little surprises in a way that makes everyone feel valued. This morning was totally unexpected and that is just one beautiful example‚Äîso thoughtful, and so "you." You outdo yourself every single time, and because of that, you make our workplace warmer, happier, and more connected. I'm genuinely grateful for you and everything you pour into our team. Thank you for being the heart behind it all.
award_title: To the Heart Behind Every HX Moment

message: Ryan, on behalf of Regional Bank launch team (Jennifer Martinez, Katie Chen, and me), thank you for answering initial questions on Content Advisor and then going above and beyond to run an analysis looking at usage across our Banking and Finance industry clients. We had a scenario where the client's program team wanted to enable it, but they had to make the case to convince their internal leadership stakeholders to do so. You kept me posted on the progress, and as a result of your stats, I was able to share them with Regional Bank to help bolster the decision to move forward with the feature. I appreciate the partnership and extra help for the customer to turn on something we both know will be of a huge benefit to their employees. (PS. I used Content Advisor on this message as well!)
award_title: Thank you for your NLP expertise!

message: Sarah, a huge Commerce thank you for your support during your secondment with the gift card sourcing team. During your time, you mastered market research, tackled outreach in tricky markets and came up with some great assortment solutions for some of our key client asks. I hope the skills and insights you've developed here continue to support you in your future and we all wish you ongoing success in your career.

Alex, I have successfully completed the Process Builder and Workflow Rule migration project with your help, which included 35+ legacy processes migrated to new CRM flows. I would like to express my sincere appreciation for your support in completing this work, as well as for creating the permission sets required for the GTM Operations role. Your timely help has been truly invaluable. Thank you again for your continued support and collaboration.

David, thank you for pulling the video platform benchmarks and sharing such thoughtful feedback on the industry videos! The performance breakdown and your perspective on what's working (and what isn't) were incredibly helpful as we rethink the content strategy for the refreshed ABM microsites. Really appreciate you taking the time to go deeper than I even asked, it made a big difference! Thanks again for the partnership and for always being so generous with your expertise.

I wanted to take a second and thank the two of you for the work you put into testing each award for each country for the launch of Phoenix Corp's Elevate and Elevate Cash programs. This was the last step in a long process, but providing them with a comprehensive payroll file was a momentous milestone in the project. You each brought your A-game to this ask and were able to assist in delivering it in record time.
award_title: Testing, Testing, 1, 2, or should I say 691

message: Hey Folks! I just wanted to take a quick moment to thank each of you for looking after my tasks while I was away. Matt, you stepped in to solve an issue with Energy Solutions whereby employees could not nominate for monetary awards. Ryan, you stepped in and looked after Aerospace Industries' text update requests. Jason, you looked after many of my reports, predominantly for Phoenix Corp. Knowing I work on such an excellent team really helps me to switch off and I was able to enjoy my trip. Thank you all!

Thank you Emma, for all of your help, support, and hard work since I joined the team. From day one, you've been someone who was kind to step in, share your knowledge and offer support whenever it was needed. You played such an important role in closing out client requests in some of our toughest markets and you handled the client scoring file with patience and diligence, even though it was an incredibly tedious and time-consuming task. You've been a genuinely wonderful part of the team‚Äîcollaborative, supportive, and overall so helpful. I've really enjoyed working with you! Wishing you all the very best for the future.

Dear Leaders, I'd like to sincerely thank you for your outstanding leadership during this first wave of peak. Even though it was a smooth one, you were fully present for both our clients and our agents every step of the way. Your kindness, dedication, and genuine care in ensuring everything runs smoothly are truly commendable. The attention you give to every single detail does not go unnoticed. In this season of gratitude, I want to express my deepest appreciation for having you lead the team. Thank you for all that you do.

Dear team, I want to take a moment to thank each of you for your outstanding work throughout the Thanksgiving and Black Friday period. You have demonstrated exceptional dedication, patience, and teamwork at every turn. As we move into an even busier stretch, please know that your efforts are truly seen and deeply appreciated. You continue to set the bar for what great customer service looks like. Your dedication and teamwork truly make a difference, and I'm incredibly grateful to have each of you as part of this team.
award_title: Celebrating your hard work, excellence & teamwork

message: Tremendous work in your personalized outreach to Stellar Technologies. Absolutely loved how you emailed and connected with the Head of HR on LinkedIn ‚Äì then used past experiences at TechSolutions clients + following us on LinkedIn to write a phenomenal email then chased down for a reply on LI direct messaging. Great way to connect with HR leaders for meetings. Nice work!

Hi Rachel, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for being my go-to person for any difficult query. You're my walking knowledge base ‚Äî always happy, approachable, and willing to review cases and provide the right advice. I truly appreciate your support and guidance ‚Äî it makes handling challenging situations so much easier and ensures we're providing the best service possible. Thank you for always being there!

Jessica, thank you so much for taking the time and effort to drop a surprise on each of our desks this morning. Each gift was so thoughtful and personal to the person receiving it. It was such a lovely surprise and definitely has kicked off all of the Christmas feels and festivities in the office! Doing something like this takes so much time, creativity and thoughtfulness, from choosing the personal items, to organising and delivering them to each desk ! Thank you again, you certainly put a smile on my face this morning!

Marcus, thank you for your cooperation on the New Bank set up in our ERP system. You kindly shared information with me around the process and communication with Finance. It took a while to gather all required info and create a test case for future to understand what is needed. Thanks for your help!

Kevin, I would like to thank you for all the tips you shared with me yesterday regarding the Global Healthcare retirement access. With just a few minutes of your time, I was able to learn more about this, review my previous access, and understand how to proceed. Thank you so much for sharing your knowledge!
Thanks Michael for going through the effort to organize a team bonding evening. It was nice to catchup with the team after such a long time, appreciate you making the effort to bring us all together.

Tyler, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for all your hard work while I was out sick. You kept everything running smoothly, and it was truly appreciated. Not only did you stay on top of everything, but you also stepped up and represented Indirect AP on multiple calls for onboarding the new EOR vendor. I essentially missed the entire process, and you were thrown in at the deep end‚Äîyet you still managed to support it successfully and provide valuable feedback from AP's perspective. It's great to know I have such a solid colleague to rely on when it really counts. Thank you so much.

Sophie, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for all the great collaboration we've had, especially in onboarding new suppliers. Your positive attitude, teamwork spirit, and willingness to go the extra mile made a real difference. It's been inspiring to see your growth and development, and I'm excited to see all the great things you'll achieve. Wishing you continued success in this next chapter!

Victoria, I want to sincerely thank you for your exceptional leadership, strategic thinking, and unwavering support. You've been such an inspiring mentor, always providing guidance, trust, and opportunities that have helped me grow professionally. Your approachability, insight, and encouragement have made a lasting impact on me, and I'm truly grateful for the privilege of learning from you during my time in eCommerce.Xx
award_title: Thank You for Helping Me Grow

message: Congratulations to Amy and Laura for their outstanding collaboration on the successful onboarding of ShopMart, one of Central Asia's leading e-commerce platforms offering a wide range of quality global and local brands across retail, services, and experiences, for Mining Corp. This launch was especially impactful, covering a location where 80% of Mining Corp employees are based, addressing a need that had remained uncovered until now. Working together, we delivered a Q4 launch, demonstrating dedication, coordination, and client-focused execution. This success wouldn't have been possible without our joint effort.

Anton this award is somewhat overdue. I wanted to take a minute to thank you for all of the support you have been showing Denis during his onboarding. You have helped ensure that his transition into Branding was as seamless as possible. I know how much he has valued being able to reach out to you as needed, and the clear swift help you've provided. Thank you for that. But I also need to thank you for something else. Anton your contribution over the years to the Branding team has been outstanding. I am not sure people understand exactly how much help you have been to us and our customers. The noted uptick in quality from when you joined our team - way back - was and is so impressive. Your exacting eye for detail, your attitude, your teamwork, your good humour and your friendly style, has been such a boost for the team. We are sad to see you move on to another team, but thrilled that you are still only a click away on Slack. A massive thank you Anton for all that you contributed to Branding over the years. You're a big part of why the Branding team has gone from strength to strength. Your ongoing support with Denis shows how much you care about Branding too. So, thank you Anton. On behalf of Val, Aidan, Cliona and myself - not to mention Denis, Lucas and Laura - thank you and great job! Take a bow.

Hi Jake, I just wanted to say thank you for giving me a hand, actually, for taking on the automation yourself when it went over my head. The previous automation message was quite generic and didn't provide much context whenever a change was made to the page. It also caused confusion because a message was sent even when something was removed, showing as an update. I really appreciate the effort and thought you put into this small change. It will make a meaningful difference for our team.

Before this year ends, I want to thank you both ‚Äî Sarah and Emma ‚Äî for always taking the time to explain things and support me throughout my (almost) first six months with TechFlow Solutions. Even though you're not part of my team, it truly feels like you are, especially when we work together on weekends. I really appreciate your patience, guidance, and kindness.

Hi ladies, I want to say a huge thank you for all your help throughout the year. Your willingness to share your knowledge and your thoughtful curation of the collections have been truly incredible. You each play a significant role in the success of our promotions, and I deeply appreciate your hard work, dedication, and collaboration in sharing the collections in advance so we can source the best promotions for our end users. Thank you for everything you do.
award_title: With Gratitude for an Incredible Team

message: Marcus! Our cultural energizer who is always celebrating others and planning special gatherings, and we missed YOUR birthday!! Hope it was a fab extra long weekend with Rachel and the kids. Loved the extensive in-person time we had last week in the office and celebrating in Riverside! What an unforgettable weekend :) Thanks for all you do for all of us and cheers to you on your birthday week!
Happy Birthday Maya! Hope you have a great day!

Alex and Jordan, I wanted to take a moment to thank you both for your proactive support when the customer reached out looking to send a nomination as a delegate via mobile. Since this information wasn't available anywhere, you both took the initiative to add one another as delegates and test the process yourselves to ensure we could provide the customer with accurate guidance and confirm there were no issues on their side. Your dedication, quick thinking, and commitment to getting the right answer truly stand out. This recognition is long overdue, but very much deserved. Thank you both ‚Äî I really appreciate your support.
award_title: Thank You for Your Proactive Support!

message: Hi Alex, I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for going above and beyond in helping me understand the discrepancy on my payslip. I really appreciate the time you took to walk me through the details, open a ticket for clarification, follow up on a resolution, and keep me updated throughout the process. Your support made a big difference, and I'm truly grateful for your dedication and responsiveness. Thanks again for all your help!
award_title: Appreciation for Your Outstanding Support, Alex!

message: Hey team, I just want to say a big thank you for all the effort over the past week, tackling challenges like Thanksgiving, Black Friday, and now Cyber Week. Volumes have been steady, even leaning toward an increase, but you all stood your ground, making sure customers have a great experience with minimal complaints and showing a positive attitude throughout. I truly appreciate everything you've done so far and all the effort you'll continue to put in over the coming weeks. Thanks again for everything you're doing, both individually and as a team!

Thank you all for your collaboration and persistence in bringing the MegaMart digital gift card live in Singapore. Transitioning our largest gift card in the market to digital is a significant achievement. We're seeing substantial shipping savings, eliminating long lead times, reducing customer service issues, and delivering a much-improved customer experience. With Singapore now nearly 100% digital, this is a true win‚Äìwin for the market and for our clients. It also further strengthens our partnership with one of our key suppliers. Great work and thank you again for the collective effort that made this possible üôå
award_title: A Significant Win - MegaMart Goes Digital in Singapore!

message: Hi Sofia, Thank you so much for the first-hand update on the new gift card additions to our store. We genuinely weren't aware that ShopCenter and Plaza Village gift cards were being launched, so your heads-up was incredibly helpful ‚Äî not just for us in Customer Service, but for us as users too. A big thank-you as well for being my point of contact in the eCommerce team, and for the insights, updates, and collaboration with Customer Service to ensure we deliver the best possible experience to our end users. The team was delighted with the information. Thanks again for keeping us in the loop!
thanks for helping me triage a potential component library single-select focus issue based on your experience of fixing this for Android.

I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for your continued partnership and support. I truly appreciate your willingness to discuss escalation cases with me, review emails, and collaborate on the best approach and communication with our customers. This dedication extends beyond escalated cases to our day-to-day work as well. I'm grateful to work alongside you as desk-neighbours and deliver top-notch customer service together. Thank you for always being approachable, collaborative, and committed ‚Äî it really makes a difference!

Riley/Sam, in the last few months you both moved from Team Phoenix to Team Velocity and temporarily back again. You were both excited moving across to Team Velocity and brought your skill and enthusiasm. You had an instant impact on spend work on the front end, testing, accessibility and more on our Budget Management App. Now though we have shifted to help the highly important media work with Team Phoenix. message: Thanks Ryan for your  proactive monitoring during the Cyber Monday  period. I want to take a moment to thank each of you for your hard work over the Thanksgiving and Black Friday period. Alex, I want to take a moment to recognize the outstanding work you put into organizing and executing Security Week in November. What you accomplished was truly impressive - you coordinated a complex, multi-month effort that required careful planning with our vendor partner SecureTech, ensuring all our teams were prepared and ready to participate, and managing all the logistics throughout the week itself, right down to keeping everyone fueled with doughnuts and pizzas. The results speak for themselves: over 2,500 security issues resolved during the week. That's a tremendous achievement that significantly strengthens our security posture, and it's a direct result of your dedication and attention to detail in making this event a success. What often goes unseen is all the work you did behind the scenes throughout the week - ensuring teams could get impediments cleared quickly and efficiently so they could maintain momentum and keep making progress. That kind of responsive support was critical to achieving the results we saw. What's equally impressive is that you're not resting on these results. You're already looking ahead, planning what we need to do to build on this momentum and have our teams ready for January 1st when we take the next step in improving our security posture. Your work on Security Week exemplifies the kind of initiative, organizational skill, and commitment to excellence that makes a real difference for our platform and our organization. Thank you for your exceptional effort and leadership on this initiative.

We had Black Friday , and cyber Monday thrown in for good measure and it is the start of our busy Q4 peak. Every year we get to this point and with all the challenges you face, you embrace them and face them head on, ensuring our customers experience is at the forefront of every interaction. I really appreciate you all,  and the hard work you do over this busy period. Thank you so much Champions, you're simply the best!!

Thank you all for successfully delivering the Budget Management 2.0 fix for TechCorp. This work is a strong example of team excellence under urgency. From Product raising the issue early and preparing requirements quickly, to the team adapting, switching context, implementing the solution, and completing intensive testing, every step showed real ownership and quality.  After identifying the root cause of the performance failures in the Org Budget Amount calculations, you delivered a clean, effective fix: removing the org-level feed, updating the backend to return direct-manager data, and ensuring the UI remained seamless.  Releasing this work on such a tight timeline was critical, it unblocked TechCorp from increasing their budget allocations, protected millions in customer value, kept our Q4 commitments on track, and demonstrated exceptional adaptability during a high-stakes escalation.  Your collaboration and dedication throughout this effort, while reprioritizing during Security Week and navigating the code freeze, was outstanding.  Great work all!!
award_title: Budget Management 2.0 Fix Delivered for TechCorp

message: Thank you for the collaboration on the Wellness creative! The Client Engagement and Customer Excellence teams had a lot of positive feedback on the collection mock-ups. The Q4 period is always a juggling act, so I wanted to say that I appreciate you and the help on this during this busy time.

Thank you both for your support on the most recent GlobalTech review. We were tasked with sharing successes of their current program while also trying to help them understand the need to add Monetary recognition in the near future. Sarah, thank you so much for all of your help with the prep. You supported me in ensuring that we were sharing the correct information with the team to help drive home the need for monetary recognition. You also presented a very clear outline of the benefits GlobalTech would expect should they add monetary in the future, along with the drawbacks if they did not. James, it was so great to have you on the call to meet the team and thank you for sharing the opportunities GlobalTech has to increase reach/frequency with their program as is today. This was an important piece of the conversation because it helped show GlobalTech that we can still support them regardless of their program structure looks like. In the end this review helped GlobalTech to feel very supported as a client and gave them a lot to think about for 2026!

Thank you all so much for your support on IndustryCorp's most recent account review. I was nervous how interactive the IndustryCorp team would be but we were able to get them to open up and share many helpful insights to help us continue to grow the program. Lisa, Thank you for the countless hours you spent with me in prep meetings to ensure we were sharing the right message for the team. James, Thank you for also joining review calls to ensure the deck made sense and for taking time out of your day join the call. Robert, thank you for leading the discussion regarding IndustryCorp's plans for 2026 and getting an overview on 2025. This really helped to set the meeting up for success and ensured that we know how to continue to help support the team.

I'd love to recognise Jessica for being an exceptional onboarding buddy over the past month (and ongoing). From day one, she has made me feel comfortable, welcome, and truly part of both the team and the wider org.   What blows me away is that she's done all of this while just returning from maternity leave herself. Despite juggling so much, she has still carved out time to meet with me daily‚Äîwalking me through tasks, sharing honest insights from the launch consulting role, and making sure I haven't felt lost or out of sorts. She is an incredibly patient and attentive teammate and brings so much warmth to every interaction.  I really appreciate her attention to detail and a prime example of this is her creating a personalised onboarding plan paired with a task management checklist which I admit, gives me an unreasonable amount of joy each time I complete a task. And thanks to her nudge, I've already started building a network of cross-functional peers - which have been some of my favorite chats so far.  When my son Oliver was sick and I needed to work from home, Jessica's understanding and reassurance made the world of difference. She removed the anxiety before it could settle in, and I can't tell you how much that support means to me as a new joiner and mum.  It's also been so lovely getting to know her on a personal level‚Äîour shared love of food (clearly a theme on the launch consultant team), the kids connection, the outdoors, our siblings‚Ä¶ the list keeps growing. I know we're going to share many more laughs and "omg me too!" moments.  Thank you, Jessica, for your generosity, guidance, and the care you put into everything. I'm so, so happy to be your teammate.

Nathan,  thank you for your partnership and collaboration on all things Phoenix & Vector over the past year. It's been and continues to be an absolute pleasure working with you! tackling the daily challenges that come our way head on as a team, and consistently sharing a clear vision for how things should be done. Your calm, can do mindset and deep product knowledge perfectly complement your drive to succeed and to help us achieve our collective goals as a development and leadership team. Thank you for bringing your authentic self to work every day, and for everything you do to support the team and me. I'm genuinely looking forward to many more successes ahead, and to navigating whatever challenges come our way, I believe with the right team working together in harmony and respectfully there's no limit to what we can achieve!

You've been such an incredible mentor, from offering great advice, chorus calls to review, sharing great tips, helping me prep, you've been such an incredible help and really set me up for success during the process and now in the role. You were always open to jumping on a call to idea share and give me feedback and I'm so thankful for what I've been able to learn from you and what I'll continue to learn from you on the team! Your ongoing support helped me feel even more prepared and confident and I can't wait to continue working together!! Thanks so much for always being a team player and sharing your best practices!!
award_title: Team work makes the dream work!

message: Marcus, a long overdue recognition for your leadership and being the glue that holds everything on the frontend/UI together. message: Thank you so much for covering for me while I was out of the office Thanksgiving week! I have a unique mix of projects happening right now, and I appreciate that you took the time to get up to speed on each one so that you could take on any request or question that came in. Knowing that you had me covered allowed me to completely disconnect and focus on starting the process of putting my apartment back together. Thank you for being an amazing teammate!

I want to congratulate and thank you all for the successful release of the Semantic Search feature for Corporate topics to production. This was a fantastic achievement for our newly-formed Alpha and Beta squads following the re-org in July. The squads have now taken full ownership of the personalisation architecture, and achieved several firsts for TechCorp.   The first time changing search index mapping in production using a blue-green approach, applying the infrastructure format for ML deployments, deploying an embedding model, the first time storing and processing embeddings at runtime.....the list goes on.   This was a massive team effort involving collaboration across the org, from Recognition, Analytics data scientists, Platform team, Program Manager and more. I want to give a particular shout out to Alex for his technical leadership and co-ordination of all the moving parts required to achieve this launch.
award_title: Topics and Semantic Search Early Access

message: Hi Drew, I wanted to express my gratitude for the work you've done in building such a useful AI tool for code repository analysis, and for taking the time to help me adapt it to my specific task. Without your tool‚Äîand your support‚ÄîI would have spent much more time on this, and the outcome wouldn't have been nearly as comprehensive. Thanks again!
award_title: Thank you for your work on a very useful AI tool

message: Blake! Thank you so much for updating bank details in our financial system for Northern Insurance Group so quickly. Although we have had their wire template set up for some time now, it's been a couple of years since anyone has been actively enrolled with this benefit for us to use it. Unfortunately, there is a back story to this, so it was extremely important that there wasn't a disruption in the transfer to their account. Thank you for taking this on directly and working with us on this! You are a gem and I am grateful for your help!

Quinn, thank you for your time today to discuss some actions and review feedback and work towards resolutions and mitigate future concerns. Appreciate your input and collaboration on this sensitive case.

Well done team on completing Phase 2 testing, from requests, assessments, testing, peer review, issues & remediation - it's great to see all the hard work over the past quarter (and beyond) come together in our Phase 2 report. Even better to see the partnerships with various owners across the business evolve as we work together to enhance our control environment and mitigate risks! Keep up the great work & thanks for all you do!
